raw: וַיִּהְיוּ כָּל־הַפְּקֻדִים שֵׁשׁ־מֵאוֹת אֶלֶף וּשְׁלֹשֶׁת אֲלָפִים וַחֲמֵשׁ מֵאוֹת וַחֲמִשִּׁים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And all the numbered were six hundred thousand and three thousand and five hundred and fifty.

raw: וְהַלְוִיִּם לְמַטֵּה אֲבֹתָם לֹא הָתְפָּקְדוּ בְּתוֹכָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: But the Levites after the tribe of their fathers were not numbered among them.

hebrew_roots.meaning: To count, to visit, to appoint

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה לֵּאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the Lord spoke to Moses, saying:

raw: אַךְ אֶת־מַטֵּה לֵוִי לֹא תִפְקֹד וְאֶת־רֹאשָׁם לֹא תִשָּׂא בְּתוֹךְ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Only the tribe of Levi you shall not count, and their number you shall not take among the children of Israel.

raw: וְאַתָּה הַפְקֵד אֶת־הַלְוִיִּם עַל־מִשְׁכַּן הָעֵדֻת וְעַל כָּל־כֵּלָיו וְעַל כָּל־אֲשֶׁר־לוֹ הֵמָּה יִשְׂאוּ אֶת־הַמִּשְׁכָּן וְאֶת־כָּל־כֵּלָיו וְהֵם יְשָׁרְתֻהוּ וְסָבִיב לַמִּשְׁכָּן יַחֲנוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you, appoint the Levites over the tabernacle of the testimony, and over all its furnishings, and over all that belongs to it. They shall carry the tabernacle and all its furnishings, and they shall minister to it, and they shall camp around the tabernacle.

raw: וּבִנְסֹעַ הַמִּשְׁכָּן יוֹרִידוּ אֹתוֹ הַלְוִיִּם וּבַחֲנֹת הַמִּשְׁכָּן יָקִימוּ אֹתוֹ הַלְוִיִּם וְהַזָּר הַקָּרֵב יוּמָת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And when the tabernacle is to move, the Levites shall take it down; and when the tabernacle is to be set up, the Levites shall set it up. And the outsider who comes near shall be put to death.

hebrew_roots.meaning: to journey, to depart, to move
to encamp, to settle, to halt
to arise, to stand, to establish, to set up

raw: וְחָנוּ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל אִישׁ עַל־מַחֲנֵהוּ וְאִישׁ עַל־דִּגְלוֹ לְצִבְאֹתָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the children of Israel shall encamp, each man by his own camp, and each man by his own standard, according to their hosts.

hebrew_roots.meaning: to build, to construct (here: sons of)
their hosts, according to their divisions

raw: וְהַלְוִיִּם יַחֲנוּ סָבִיב לְמִשְׁכַּן הָעֵדֻת וְלֹא־יִהְיֶה קֶצֶף עַל־עֲדַת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְשָׁמְרוּ הַלְוִיִּם אֶת־מִשְׁמֶרֶת מִשְׁכַּן הָעֵדוּת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: But the Levites shall camp around the tabernacle of the testimony, so that there may be no wrath on the congregation of the people of Israel. The Levites shall keep guard over the tabernacle of the testimony.
hebrew_roots: לוה (LWH - to join, to accompany, to lend)

raw: וַיַּעֲשׂוּ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל כְּכֹל אֲשֶׁר צִוָּה יְהוָה אֶת־מֹשֶׁה כֵּן עָשׂוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the children of Israel did according to all that the LORD commanded Moses; so they did.

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה וְאֶל־אַהֲרֹן לֵאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the Lord spoke to Moses and to Aaron, saying:

raw: אִישׁ עַל־דִּגְלוֹ בְאֹתֹת לְבֵית אֲבֹתָם יַחֲנוּ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל מִנֶּגֶד סָבִיב לְאֹהֶל־מוֹעֵד יַחֲנוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Every man of the children of Israel shall pitch by his own standard, with the ensign of their father's house; far off about the tabernacle of the congregation shall they pitch.

raw: וְהַחֹנִים קֵדְמָה מִזְרָחָה דֶּגֶל מַחֲנֵה יְהוּדָה לְצִבְאֹתָם וְנָשִׂיא לִבְנֵי יְהוּדָה נַחְשׁוֹן בֶּן־עַמִּינָדָב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And those who encamp on the east side, toward the sunrise, shall be the standard of the camp of Judah according to their hosts. And the leader of the people of Judah shall be Nahshon the son of Amminadab.

raw: וּצְבָאוֹ וּפְקֻדֵיהֶם אַרְבָּעָה וְשִׁבְעִים אֶלֶף וְשֵׁשׁ מֵאוֹת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: and his army and their numbered men, seventy-four thousand and six hundred.

raw: וְהַחֹנִים עָלָיו מַטֵּה יִשָּׂשכָר וְנָשִׂיא לִבְנֵי יִשָּׂשכָר נְתַנְאֵל בֶּן־צוּעָר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And those encamping beside him [are of] the division of Issachar, and the leader of the sons of Issachar is Nethanel son of Zuar.

raw: וּצְבָאוֹ וּפְקֻדָיו אַרְבָּעָה וַחֲמִשִּׁים אֶלֶף וְאַרְבַּע מֵאוֹת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And his army and those numbered of them, fifty-four thousand and four hundred.

raw: מַטֵּה זְבוּלֻן וְנָשִׂיא לִבְנֵי זְבוּלֻן אֱלִיאָב בֶּן־חֵלֹן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: The tribe of Zebulun, and the leader for the sons of Zebulun, Eliab the son of Helon.

raw: וּצְבָאוֹ וּפְקֻדָיו שִׁבְעָה וַחֲמִשִּׁים אֶלֶף וְאַרְבַּע מֵאוֹת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And his army and their numbered men were fifty-seven thousand and four hundred.

raw: כָּל־הַפְּקֻדִים לְמַחֲנֵה יְהוּדָה מְאַת אֶלֶף וּשְׁמֹנִים אֶלֶף וְשֵׁשֶׁת־אֲלָפִים וְאַרְבַּע־מֵאוֹת לְצִבְאֹתָם רִאשֹׁנָה יִסָּעוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: All those counted of the camp of Judah were one hundred and eighty-six thousand and four hundred, according to their divisions; they shall set out first.

raw: דֶּגֶל מַחֲנֵה רְאוּבֵן תֵּימָנָה לְצִבְאֹתָם וְנָשִׂיא לִבְנֵי רְאוּבֵן אֱלִיצוּר בֶּן־שְׁדֵיאוּר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: The banner of the camp of Reuben, according to their legions, was southward. And the leader of the sons of Reuben was Elizur the son of Shedeur.

raw: וּצְבָאוֹ וּפְקֻדָיו שִׁשָּׁה וְאַרְבָּעִים אֶלֶף וַחֲמֵשׁ מֵאוֹת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And his army and those counted of them [were] forty-six thousand five hundred.

raw: וְהַחוֹנִם עָלָיו מַטֵּה שִׁמְעוֹן וְנָשִׂיא לִבְנֵי שִׁמְעוֹן שְׁלֻמִיאֵל בֶּן־צוּרִי־שַׁדָּי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And those who encamp by him shall be the tribe of Simeon, and the leader for the children of Simeon shall be Shelumiel the son of Zurishaddai.

hebrew_roots.etymology: Combination of שלום (shalom - peace) and אל (el - God)
Combination of צורי (Tzur - rock) and שדי (Shaddai - Almighty)

raw: וּצְבָאוֹ וּפְקֻדֵיהֶם תִּשְׁעָה וַחֲמִשִּׁים אֶלֶף וּשְׁלֹשׁ מֵאוֹת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And his army, and those counted of them, were fifty-nine thousand three hundred.

raw: וְמַטֵּה גָּד וְנָשִׂיא לִבְנֵי גָד אֶלְיָסָף בֶּן־רְעוּאֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the tribe of Gad, and the leader of the sons of Gad was Eliasaph the son of Reuel.

raw: וּצְבָאוֹ וּפְקֻדֵיהֶם חֲמִשָּׁה וְאַרְבָּעִים אֶלֶף וְשֵׁשׁ מֵאוֹת וַחֲמִשִּׁים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: and his host, and those that were numbered of them, forty and five thousand and six hundred and fifty.

raw: כָּל־הַפְּקֻדִים לְמַחֲנֵה רְאוּבֵן מְאַת אֶלֶף וְאֶחָד וַחֲמִשִּׁים אֶלֶף וְאַרְבַּע־מֵאוֹת וַחֲמִשִּׁים לְצִבְאֹתָם וּשְׁנִיִּם יִסָּעוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: All those numbered of the camp of Reuben [were] one hundred thousand and one and fifty thousand and four hundred and fifty, according to their armies; and they shall set out second.

raw: וְנָסַע אֹהֶל־מוֹעֵד מַחֲנֵה הַלְוִיִּם בְּתוֹךְ הַמַּחֲנֹת כַּאֲשֶׁר יַחֲנוּ כֵּן יִסָּעוּ אִישׁ עַל־יָדוֹ לְדִגְלֵיהֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the Tent of Meeting shall travel with the camp of the Levites in the midst of the camps; as they encamp, so shall they travel, each in his place, by their standards.

ai_data.translation_rugged: The banner of the camp of Ephraim according to their hosts was westward, and the leader of the sons of Ephraim was Elishama the son of Ammihud.

raw: וּצְבָאוֹ וּפְקֻדֵיהֶם אַרְבָּעִים אֶלֶף וַחֲמֵשׁ מֵאוֹת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And his army and those numbered of them were forty thousand and five hundred.

ai_data.translation_rugged: And over him was the staff of Manasseh, and the leader for the sons of Manasseh was Gamaliel son of Pedahzur.

raw: וּצְבָאוֹ וּפְקֻדֵיהֶם שְׁנַיִם וּשְׁלֹשִׁים אֶלֶף וּמָאתָיִם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And his army and those enrolled with them were thirty-two thousand and two hundred.

raw: וּמַטֵּה בִּנְיָמִן וְנָשִׂיא לִבְנֵי בִנְיָמִן אֲבִידָן בֶּן־גִּדְעֹנִי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the tribe of Benjamin, and the leader for the sons of Benjamin, Abidan son of Gideoni.

ai_data.translation_rugged: And his army and their numbered men, thirty-five thousand and four hundred.

raw: כָּל־הַפְּקֻדִים לְמַחֲנֵה אֶפְרַיִם מְאַת אֶלֶף וּשְׁמֹנַת־אֲלָפִים וּמֵאָה לְצִבְאֹתָם וּשְׁלִשִׁים יִסָּעוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: All those listed of the camp of Ephraim, one hundred thousand and eight thousand and one hundred, according to their divisions, shall set out third.

raw: דֶּגֶל מַחֲנֵה דָן צָפֹנָה לְצִבְאֹתָם וְנָשִׂיא לִבְנֵי דָן אֲחִיעֶזֶר בֶּן־עַמִּישַׁדָּי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: The standard of the camp of Dan was on the north side by their companies, with Ahiezer the son of Ammishaddai as leader of the tribe of Dan.

raw: וּצְבָאוֹ וּפְקֻדֵיהֶם שְׁנַיִם וְשִׁשִּׁים אֶלֶף וּשְׁבַע מֵאוֹת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And his army and their numbered men were sixty-two thousand seven hundred.

raw: וְהַחֹנִים עָלָיו מַטֵּה אָשֵׁר וְנָשִׂיא לִבְנֵי אָשֵׁר פַּגְעִיאֵל בֶּן־עָכְרָן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And those camping next to him were from the tribe of Asher: the leader for the children of Asher was Pagiel the son of Ochran.

raw: וּצְבָאוֹ וּפְקֻדֵיהֶם אֶחָד וְאַרְבָּעִים אֶלֶף וַחֲמֵשׁ מֵאוֹת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And his army and their numbered men: forty-one thousand five hundred.

raw: וּמַטֵּה נַפְתָּלִי וְנָשִׂיא לִבְנֵי נַפְתָּלִי אֲחִירַע בֶּן־עֵינָן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the tribe of Naphtali, and the leader of the sons of Naphtali, Ahira the son of Enan.

raw: וּצְבָאוֹ וּפְקֻדֵיהֶם שְׁלֹשָׁה וַחֲמִשִּׁים אֶלֶף וְאַרְבַּע מֵאוֹת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And his army and those counted of them were fifty-three thousand and four hundred.

raw: כָּל־הַפְּקֻדִים לְמַחֲנֵה דָן מְאַת אֶלֶף וְשִׁבְעָה וַחֲמִשִּׁים אֶלֶף וְשֵׁשׁ מֵאוֹת לָאַחֲרֹנָה יִסְעוּ לְדִגְלֵיהֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: All those enrolled in the camp of Dan were 157,600. They shall set out last, according to their standards.

raw: אֵלֶּה פְּקוּדֵי בְנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל לְבֵית אֲבֹתָם כָּל־פְּקוּדֵי הַמַּחֲנֹת לְצִבְאֹתָם שֵׁשׁ־מֵאוֹת אֶלֶף וּשְׁלֹשֶׁת אֲלָפִים וַחֲמֵשׁ מֵאוֹת וַחֲמִשִּׁים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: These are the reckonings of the children of Israel according to their fathers' houses; all those reckoned of the camps, according to their hosts, were six hundred thousand and three thousand and five hundred and fifty.

raw: וְהַלְוִיִּם לֹא הָתְפָּקְדוּ בְּתוֹךְ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל כַּאֲשֶׁר צִוָּה יְהוָה אֶת־מֹשֶׁה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the Levites were not numbered among the children of Israel, as the Lord commanded Moses.

raw: וַיַּעֲשׂוּ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל כְּכֹל אֲשֶׁר־צִוָּה יְהוָה אֶת־מֹשֶׁה כֵּן־חָנוּ לְדִגְלֵיהֶם וְכֵן נָסָעוּ אִישׁ לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָיו עַל־בֵּית אֲבֹתָיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the children of Israel did according to all that the LORD commanded Moses; so they pitched by their standards, and so they set forward, every one after their families, according to their fathers' houses.

raw: וְאֵלֶּה תּוֹלְדֹת אַהֲרֹן וּמֹשֶׁה בְּיוֹם דִּבֶּר יְהוָה אֶת־מֹשֶׁה בְּהַר סִינָי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And these are the generations of Aaron and Moses on the day that the Lord spoke with Moses on Mount Sinai.

raw: קַח אֶת־הַלְוִיִּם תַּחַת כָּל־בְּכוֹר בִּבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְאֶת־בֶּהֱמַת הַלְוִיִּם תַּחַת בְּהֶמְתָּם וְהָיוּ־לִי הַלְוִיִּם אֲנִי יְהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Take the Levites instead of all the firstborn among the Israelites, and the livestock of the Levites instead of their livestock. The Levites shall be Mine; I am the LORD.

raw: וְאֵת פְּדוּיֵי הַשְּׁלֹשָׁה וְהַשִּׁבְעִים וְהַמָּאתָיִם הָעֹדְפִים עַל־הַלְוִיִּם מִבְּכוֹר בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the redemption money for the two hundred and seventy-three more than the Levites from the firstborn of the children of Israel.

raw: וְלָקַחְתָּ חֲמֵשֶׁת חֲמֵשֶׁת שְׁקָלִים לַגֻּלְגֹּלֶת בְּשֶׁקֶל הַקֹּדֶשׁ תִּקָּח עֶשְׂרִים גֵּרָה הַשָּׁקֶל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall take five shekels, five shekels per head, according to the shekel of the sanctuary; twenty gerahs shall be the shekel.

raw: וְנָתַתָּה הַכֶּסֶף לְאַהֲרֹן וּלְבָנָיו פְּדוּיֵי הָעֹדְפִים בָּהֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall give the money to Aaron and his sons, the redemption price for those exceeding them.

raw: וַיִּקַּח מֹשֶׁה אֵת כֶּסֶף הַפִּדְיוֹם מֵאֵת הָעֹדְפִים עַל פְּדוּיֵי הַלְוִיִּם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses took the redemption money from those who exceeded the number redeemed of the Levites.

raw: מֵאֵת בְּכוֹר בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל לָקַח אֶת־הַכָּסֶף חֲמִשָּׁה וְשִׁשִּׁים וּשְׁלֹשׁ מֵאוֹת וָאֶלֶף בְּשֶׁקֶל הַקֹּדֶשׁ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: From the firstborn of the sons of Israel he took the silver, one thousand three hundred and sixty-five, according to the shekel of the sanctuary.

raw: וַיִּתֵּן מֹשֶׁה אֶת־כֶּסֶף הַפְּדֻיִם לְאַהֲרֹן וּלְבָנָיו עַל־פִּי יְהוָה כַּאֲשֶׁר צִוָּה יְהוָה אֶת־מֹשֶׁה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses gave the money of those redeemed to Aaron and his sons, according to the word of the LORD, as the LORD commanded Moses.

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה וְאֶל־אַהֲרֹן לֵאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD spoke to Moses and to Aaron, saying:

raw: נָשֹׂא אֶת־רֹאשׁ בְּנֵי קְהָת מִתּוֹךְ בְּנֵי לֵוִי לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם לְבֵית אֲבֹתָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Take a census of the sons of Kohath from among the sons of Levi, by their families, by their fathers' houses.

raw: מִבֶּן שְׁלֹשִׁים שָׁנָה וָמַעְלָה וְעַד בֶּן־חֲמִשִּׁים שָׁנָה כָּל־בָּא לַצָּבָא לַעֲשׂוֹת מְלָאכָה בְּאֹהֶל מוֹעֵד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: From thirty years old and upward, until fifty years old, all who enter the service to do work in the tent of meeting.

raw: זֹאת עֲבֹדַת בְּנֵי־קְהָת בְּאֹהֶל מוֹעֵד קֹדֶשׁ הַקֳּדָשִׁים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: This is the service of the sons of Kohath in the tent of meeting, the most holy place.

hebrew_roots.meaning: the most holy places, holy of holies

raw: וּבָא אַהֲרֹן וּבָנָיו בִּנְסֹעַ הַמַּחֲנֶה וְהוֹרִדוּ אֵת פָּרֹכֶת הַמָּסָךְ וְכִסּוּ־בָהּ אֵת אֲרֹן הָעֵדֻת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Aaron and his sons shall come, when the camp is to set forward, and they shall take down the veil of the screen, and cover the ark of the testimony with it.

hebrew_roots.meaning: to go down, to take down

raw: וְנָתְנוּ עָלָיו כְּסוּי עוֹר תַּחַשׁ וּפָרְשׂוּ בֶגֶד־כְּלִיל תְּכֵלֶת מִלְמָעְלָה וְשָׂמוּ בַּדָּיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they shall put on it a covering of tachash skin, and spread over it a cloth of entirely blue, and put its poles in place.

raw: וְעַל שֻׁלְחַן הַפָּנִים יִפְרְשׂוּ בֶּגֶד תְּכֵלֶת וְנָתְנוּ עָלָיו אֶת־הַקְּעָרֹת וְאֶת־הַכַּפֹּת וְאֶת־הַמְּנַקִּיֹּת וְאֵת קְשׂוֹת הַנָּסֶךְ וְלֶחֶם הַתָּמִיד עָלָיו יִהְיֶה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And upon the table of showbread they shall spread a cloth of blue, and put on it the dishes, the spoons, the bowls, and the pitchers for the drink offering; the regular bread shall be on it.

raw: וּפָרְשׂוּ עֲלֵיהֶם בֶּגֶד תּוֹלַעַת שָׁנִי וְכִסּוּ אֹתוֹ בְּמִכְסֵה עוֹר תָּחַשׁ וְשָׂמוּ אֶת־בַּדָּיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they shall spread over them a cloth of scarlet, and cover it with a covering of tahash skin, and put in its poles.

raw: וְלָקְחוּ בֶּגֶד תְּכֵלֶת וְכִסּוּ אֶת־מְנֹרַת הַמָּאוֹר וְאֶת־נֵרֹתֶיהָ וְאֶת־מַלְקָחֶיהָ וְאֶת־מַחְתֹּתֶיהָ וְאֵת כָּל־כְּלֵי שַׁמְנָהּ אֲשֶׁר יְשָׁרְתוּ־לָהּ בָּהֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they shall take a cloth of blue and cover the lampstand for light, with its lamps, its tongs, its trays, and all its oil vessels with which they minister to it.

raw: וְנָתְנוּ אֹתָהּ וְאֶת־כָּל־כֵּלֶיהָ אֶל־מִכְסֵה עוֹר תָּחַשׁ וְנָתְנוּ עַל־הַמּוֹט׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they shall put it and all its utensils in a covering of skins of תָּחַשׁ, and they shall put it on a pole.

raw: וְעַל מִזְבַּח הַזָּהָב יִפְרְשׂוּ בֶּגֶד תְּכֵלֶת וְכִסּוּ אֹתוֹ בְּמִכְסֵה עוֹר תָּחַשׁ וְשָׂמוּ אֶת־בַּדָּיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And upon the golden altar they shall spread a cloth of blue, and cover it with a covering of tachash skin, and put in its poles.

raw: וְלָקְחוּ אֶת־כָּל־כְּלֵי הַשָּׁרֵת אֲשֶׁר יְשָׁרְתוּ־בָם בַּקֹּדֶשׁ וְנָתְנוּ אֶל־בֶּגֶד תְּכֵלֶת וְכִסּוּ אוֹתָם בְּמִכְסֵה עוֹר תָּחַשׁ וְנָתְנוּ עַל־הַמּוֹט׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they shall take all the utensils of service with which they minister in the sanctuary, put them in a cloth of blue, cover them with a covering of tachash skin, and place them on the carrying frame.

raw: וְדִשְּׁנוּ אֶת־הַמִּזְבֵּחַ וּפָרְשׂוּ עָלָיו בֶּגֶד אַרְגָּמָן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they shall remove the ashes from the altar, and spread over it a cloth of purple.

raw: וְנָתְנוּ עָלָיו אֶת־כָּל־כֵּלָיו אֲשֶׁר יְשָׁרְתוּ עָלָיו בָּהֶם אֶת־הַמַּחְתֹּת אֶת־הַמִּזְלָגֹת וְאֶת־הַיָּעִים וְאֶת־הַמִּזְרָקֹת כֹּל כְּלֵי הַמִּזְבֵּחַ וּפָרְשׂוּ עָלָיו כְּסוּי עוֹר תַּחַשׁ וְשָׂמוּ בַדָּיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they shall put upon it all its instruments with which they minister on it, the firepans, the forks, the shovels, and the basins, all the utensils of the altar; and they shall spread over it a covering of tahash skin, and put in place its poles.

raw: וְכִלָּה אַהֲרֹן־וּבָנָיו לְכַסֹּת אֶת־הַקֹּדֶשׁ וְאֶת־כָּל־כְּלֵי הַקֹּדֶשׁ בִּנְסֹעַ הַמַּחֲנֶה וְאַחֲרֵי־כֵן יָבֹאוּ בְנֵי־קְהָת לָשֵׂאת וְלֹא־יִגְּעוּ אֶל־הַקֹּדֶשׁ וָמֵתוּ אֵלֶּה מַשָּׂא בְנֵי־קְהָת בְּאֹהֶל מוֹעֵד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And when Aaron and his sons have finished covering the holy objects and all the holy furnishings, as the camp sets out, after that the sons of Kohath shall come to carry these things. But they must not touch the holy objects, lest they die. These are the things in the tent of meeting that the sons of Kohath are to carry.

raw: וּפְקֻדַּת אֶלְעָזָר בֶּן־אַהֲרֹן הַכֹּהֵן שֶׁמֶן הַמָּאוֹר וּקְטֹרֶת הַסַּמִּים וּמִנְחַת הַתָּמִיד וְשֶׁמֶן הַמִּשְׁחָה פְּקֻדַּת כָּל־הַמִּשְׁכָּן וְכָל־אֲשֶׁר־בּוֹ בְּקֹדֶשׁ וּבְכֵלָיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the charge of Eleazar the son of Aaron the priest shall be the oil for the light, the sweet incense, the continual burnt offering, and the anointing oil, the charge of all the tabernacle and all that is in it, in the sanctuary and in its furnishings.

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה וְאֶל־אַהֲרֹן לֵאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD spoke to Moses and to Aaron, saying:

raw: אַל־תַּכְרִיתוּ אֶת־שֵׁבֶט מִשְׁפְּחֹת הַקְּהָתִי מִתּוֹךְ הַלְוִיִּם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Do not cut off the tribe of the families of the Kohathites from among the Levites.

hebrew_roots.meaning: to cut off, to make a covenant

raw: וְזֹאת עֲשׂוּ לָהֶם וְחָיוּ וְלֹא יָמֻתוּ בְּגִשְׁתָּם אֶת־קֹדֶשׁ הַקֳּדָשִׁים אַהֲרֹן וּבָנָיו יָבֹאוּ וְשָׂמוּ אוֹתָם אִישׁ אִישׁ עַל־עֲבֹדָתוֹ וְאֶל־מַשָּׂאוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And this you shall do to them, so that they may live and not die when they approach the most holy things: Aaron and his sons shall come and assign them, each man to his task and to his burden.

raw: וְלֹא־יָבֹאוּ לִרְאוֹת כְּבַלַּע אֶת־הַקֹּדֶשׁ וָמֵתוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they shall not come to see when the holy things are covered, lest they die.

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה לֵּאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying:

raw: נָשֹׂא אֶת־רֹאשׁ בְּנֵי גֵרְשׁוֹן גַּם־הֵם לְבֵית אֲבֹתָם לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Take a census of the sons of Gershon as well, by their fathers' houses, by their families.

raw: מִבֶּן שְׁלֹשִׁים שָׁנָה וָמַעְלָה עַד בֶּן־חֲמִשִּׁים שָׁנָה תִּפְקֹד אוֹתָם כָּל־הַבָּא לִצְבֹא צָבָא לַעֲבֹד עֲבֹדָה בְּאֹהֶל מוֹעֵד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: From thirty years old and upward, even to fifty years old, you shall count them, all who enter the service, to do work in the tent of meeting.

raw: זֹאת עֲבֹדַת מִשְׁפְּחֹת הַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּי לַעֲבֹד וּלְמַשָּׂא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: This is the service of the Gershonite families, in serving and carrying.

raw: וְנָשְׂאוּ אֶת־יְרִיעֹת הַמִּשְׁכָּן וְאֶת־אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד מִכְסֵהוּ וּמִכְסֵה הַתַּחַשׁ אֲשֶׁר־עָלָיו מִלְמָעְלָה וְאֶת־מָסַךְ פֶּתַח אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they shall carry the curtains of the tabernacle, and the tent of meeting, its covering, and the covering of tachash that is above it, and the screen for the entrance of the tent of meeting.

raw: וְאֵת קַלְעֵי הֶחָצֵר וְאֶת־מָסַךְ פֶּתַח שַׁעַר הֶחָצֵר אֲשֶׁר עַל־הַמִּשְׁכָּן וְעַל־הַמִּזְבֵּחַ סָבִיב וְאֵת מֵיתְרֵיהֶם וְאֶת־כָּל־כְּלֵי עֲבֹדָתָם וְאֵת כָּל־אֲשֶׁר יֵעָשֶׂה לָהֶם וְעָבָדוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the hangings of the court, and the screen for the gate of the court, which is by the tabernacle and by the altar round about, and their cords, and all the instruments of their service, and all that is to be done for them, they shall do.

raw: עַל־פִּי אַהֲרֹן וּבָנָיו תִּהְיֶה כָּל־עֲבֹדַת בְּנֵי הַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּי לְכָל־מַשָּׂאָם וּלְכֹל עֲבֹדָתָם וּפְקַדְתֶּם עֲלֵהֶם בְּמִשְׁמֶרֶת אֵת כָּל־מַשָּׂאָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: At the command of Aaron and his sons shall be all the service of the sons of the Gershonites, in all their burden, and in all their service: and ye shall appoint unto them in charge all their burden.

raw: זֹאת עֲבֹדַת מִשְׁפְּחֹת בְּנֵי הַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּי בְּאֹהֶל מוֹעֵד וּמִשְׁמַרְתָּם בְּיַד אִיתָמָר בֶּן־אַהֲרֹן הַכֹּהֵן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: This is the service of the families of the sons of Gershon in the tent of meeting, and their responsibility is under the direction of Ithamar the son of Aaron the priest.

raw: בְּנֵי מְרָרִי לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם לְבֵית־אֲבֹתָם תִּפְקֹד אֹתָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: The sons of Merari, by their families, by their fathers' houses, you shall count them.

hebrew_roots.meaning: to count, to appoint, to visit

raw: מִבֶּן שְׁלֹשִׁים שָׁנָה וָמַעְלָה וְעַד בֶּן־חֲמִשִּׁים שָׁנָה תִּפְקְדֵם כָּל־הַבָּא לַצָּבָא לַעֲבֹד אֶת־עֲבֹדַת אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: From thirty years old and upward, even to fifty years old, you shall number them, all who enter the service, to do the work in the tent of meeting.

raw: וְזֹאת מִשְׁמֶרֶת מַשָּׂאָם לְכָל־עֲבֹדָתָם בְּאֹהֶל מוֹעֵד קַרְשֵׁי הַמִּשְׁכָּן וּבְרִיחָיו וְעַמּוּדָיו וַאֲדָנָיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And this is the duty of their burden, for all their service in the tent of meeting: the boards of the tabernacle, and its bars, and its pillars, and its sockets.

raw: וְעַמּוּדֵי הֶחָצֵר סָבִיב וְאַדְנֵיהֶם וִיתֵדֹתָם וּמֵיתְרֵיהֶם לְכָל־כְּלֵיהֶם וּלְכֹל עֲבֹדָתָם וּבְשֵׁמֹת תִּפְקְדוּ אֶת־כְּלֵי מִשְׁמֶרֶת מַשָּׂאָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the pillars of the court round about, and their sockets, and their pins, and their cords, for all their instruments, and for all their service; and by names you shall number the instruments of the charge of their burden.

raw: וְהִשְׁבִּיעַ הַכֹּהֵן אֶת־הָאִשָּׁה בִּשְׁבֻעַת הָאָלָה וְאָמַר הַכֹּהֵן לָאִשָּׁה יִתֵּן יְהוָה אוֹתָךְ לְאָלָה וְלִשְׁבֻעָה בְּתוֹךְ עַמֵּךְ בְּתֵת יְהוָה אֶת־יְרֵכֵךְ נֹפֶלֶת וְאֶת־בִּטְנֵךְ צָבָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest shall cause the woman to take an oath of cursing, and the priest shall say to the woman, 'May the LORD make you an oath and an example for cursing among your people, when the LORD makes your thigh fall away and your belly swell.'

raw: וּבָאוּ הַמַּיִם הַמְאָרְרִים הָאֵלֶּה בְּמֵעַיִךְ לַצְבּוֹת בֶּטֶן וְלַנְפִּל יָרֵךְ וְאָמְרָה הָאִשָּׁה אָמֵן אָמֵן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And these bitter waters shall enter into your stomach, causing the belly to swell and the thigh to fall away. And the woman shall say, 'Amen, Amen.'

raw: וְכָתַב אֶת־הָאָלֹת הָאֵלֶּה הַכֹּהֵן בַּסֵּפֶר וּמָחָה אֶל־מֵי הַמָּרִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest shall write these curses in a book, and he shall blot them out into the bitter water.

raw: וְהִשְׁקָה אֶת־הָאִשָּׁה אֶת־מֵי הַמָּרִים הַמְאָרֲרִים וּבָאוּ בָהּ הַמַּיִם הַמְאָרֲרִים לְמָרִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall make the woman drink the bitter water that brings a curse, and the water that brings a curse shall enter into her and cause bitter suffering.

raw: וְלָקַח הַכֹּהֵן מִיַּד הָאִשָּׁה אֵת מִנְחַת הַקְּנָאֹת וְהֵנִיף אֶת־הַמִּנְחָה לִפְנֵי יְהוָה וְהִקְרִיב אֹתָהּ אֶל־הַמִּזְבֵּחַ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest shall take from the woman's hand the offering of jealousy, and he shall wave the offering before the LORD and offer it on the altar.

raw: וְקָמַץ הַכֹּהֵן מִן־הַמִּנְחָה אֶת־אַזְכָּרָתָהּ וְהִקְטִיר הַמִּזְבֵּחָה וְאַחַר יַשְׁקֶה אֶת־הָאִשָּׁה אֶת־הַמָּיִם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest shall take a handful from the offering, its memorial portion, and burn it on the altar, and afterward, he shall make the woman drink the water.

raw: וְהִשְׁקָהּ אֶת־הַמַּיִם וְהָיְתָה אִם־נִטְמְאָה וַתִּמְעֹל מַעַל בְּאִישָׁהּ וּבָאוּ בָהּ הַמַּיִם הַמְאָרֲרִים לְמָרִים וְצָבְתָה בִטְנָהּ וְנָפְלָה יְרֵכָהּ וְהָיְתָה הָאִשָּׁה לְאָלָה בְּקֶרֶב עַמָּהּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall make her drink the water, and if she has defiled herself and acted unfaithfully against her husband, then the water that brings a curse shall enter into her and cause bitter pain, and her belly shall swell, and her thigh shall fall away, and the woman shall become an oath of execration among her people.

raw: וְאִם־לֹא נִטְמְאָה הָאִשָּׁה וּטְהֹרָה הִוא וְנִקְּתָה וְנִזְרְעָה זָרַע׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if the woman has not defiled herself, but is pure, she shall be cleared and conceive offspring.

raw: זֹאת תּוֹרַת הַקְּנָאֹת אֲשֶׁר תִּשְׂטֶה אִשָּׁה תַּחַת אִישָׁהּ וְנִטְמָאָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: This is the law of jealousy, when a wife goes astray while under her husband's authority, and defiles herself.

raw: אוֹ אִישׁ אֲשֶׁר תַּעֲבֹר עָלָיו רוּחַ קִנְאָה וְקִנֵּא אֶת־אִשְׁתּוֹ וְהֶעֱמִיד אֶת־הָאִשָּׁה לִפְנֵי יְהוָה וְעָשָׂה לָהּ הַכֹּהֵן אֵת כָּל־הַתּוֹרָה הַזֹּאת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Or if a man, over whom the spirit of jealousy comes, and he is jealous of his wife, and he shall set the woman before the LORD, and the priest shall execute upon her all this law.

raw: וְנִקָּה הָאִישׁ מֵעָוֺן וְהָאִשָּׁה הַהִוא תִּשָּׂא אֶת־עֲוֺנָהּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the man will be free from guilt, but that woman shall bear her guilt.

hebrew_roots.meaning: be clean, be free from guilt
that one (m. used as a demonstrative)

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה לֵּאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying:

raw: דַּבֵּר אֶל־בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְאָמַרְתָּ אֲלֵהֶם אִישׁ אוֹ־אִשָּׁה כִּי יַפְלִא לִנְדֹּר נֶדֶר נָזִיר לְהַזִּיר לַיהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Speak to the children of Israel, and say to them: When a man or woman makes a special vow, the vow of a Nazirite, to consecrate himself to the Lord,

raw: מִיַּיִן וְשֵׁכָר יַזִּיר חֹמֶץ יַיִן וְחֹמֶץ שֵׁכָר לֹא יִשְׁתֶּה וְכָל־מִשְׁרַת עֲנָבִים לֹא יִשְׁתֶּה וַעֲנָבִים לַחִים וִיבֵשִׁים לֹא יֹאכֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: He shall abstain from wine and strong drink; he shall drink no vinegar made from wine or strong drink, and shall not drink any grape juice or eat fresh or dried grapes.

raw: כֹּל יְמֵי נִזְרוֹ מִכֹּל אֲשֶׁר יֵעָשֶׂה מִגֶּפֶן הַיַּיִן מֵחַרְצַנִּים וְעַד־זָג לֹא יֹאכֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: All the days of his separation he shall eat nothing that is made of the grapevine, from the kernels even to the husk.

raw: כָּל־יְמֵי נֶדֶר נִזְרוֹ תַּעַר לֹא־יַעֲבֹר עַל־רֹאשׁוֹ עַד־מְלֹאת הַיָּמִם אֲשֶׁר־יַזִּיר לַיהוָה קָדֹשׁ יִהְיֶה גַּדֵּל פֶּרַע שְׂעַר רֹאשׁוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: All the days of his vow of separation, no razor shall pass over his head. Until the time is fulfilled for which he separated himself to the Lord, he shall be holy. He shall let the locks of the hair of his head grow long.

raw: כָּל־יְמֵי הַזִּירוֹ לַיהוָה עַל־נֶפֶשׁ מֵת לֹא יָבֹא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: All the days that he separateth himself unto the LORD he shall come at no dead body.

raw: לְאָבִיו וּלְאִמּוֹ לְאָחִיו וּלְאַחֹתוֹ לֹא־יִטַּמָּא לָהֶם בְּמֹתָם כִּי נֵזֶר אֱלֹהָיו עַל־רֹאשׁוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: He shall not defile himself for them when they die, for the consecration of his God is upon his head, neither for his father, nor for his mother, nor for his brother, nor for his sister.

raw: כֹּל יְמֵי נִזְרוֹ קָדֹשׁ הוּא לַיהוָה׃

raw: וְכִי־יָמוּת מֵת עָלָיו בְּפֶתַע פִּתְאֹם וְטִמֵּא רֹאשׁ נִזְרוֹ וְגִלַּח רֹאשׁוֹ בְּיוֹם טָהֳרָתוֹ בַּיּוֹם הַשְּׁבִיעִי יְגַלְּחֶנּוּ׃

raw: וּבַיּוֹם הַשְּׁמִינִי יָבִא שְׁתֵּי תֹרִים אוֹ שְׁנֵי בְּנֵי יוֹנָה אֶל־הַכֹּהֵן אֶל־פֶּתַח אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And on the eighth day, he shall bring two turtledoves or two young pigeons to the priest, to the entrance of the tent of meeting.

raw: וְעָשָׂה הַכֹּהֵן אֶחָד לְחַטָּאת וְאֶחָד לְעֹלָה וְכִפֶּר עָלָיו מֵאֲשֶׁר חָטָא עַל־הַנָּפֶשׁ וְקִדַּשׁ אֶת־רֹאשׁוֹ בַּיּוֹם הַהוּא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest shall offer one as a sin offering and the other as a burnt offering, and make atonement for him for the sin he committed regarding the person, and consecrate his head that day.

raw: וְהִזִּיר לַיהוָה אֶת־יְמֵי נִזְרוֹ וְהֵבִיא כֶּבֶשׂ בֶּן־שְׁנָתוֹ לְאָשָׁם וְהַיָּמִים הָרִאשֹׁנִים יִפְּלוּ כִּי טָמֵא נִזְרוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall consecrate to the Lord the days of his separation, and shall bring a lamb of the first year for a guilt offering; and the former days shall be void, because his separation was defiled.

raw: וְזֹאת תּוֹרַת הַנָּזִיר בְּיוֹם מְלֹאת יְמֵי נִזְרוֹ יָבִיא אֹתוֹ אֶל־פֶּתַח אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And this is the law of the Nazirite on the day his term of consecration is completed: he shall be brought to the entrance of the Tent of Meeting.

raw: וְהִקְרִיב אֶת־קָרְבָּנוֹ לַיהוָה כֶּבֶשׂ בֶּן־שְׁנָתוֹ תָמִים אֶחָד לְעֹלָה וְכַבְשָׂה אַחַת בַּת־שְׁנָתָהּ תְּמִימָה לְחַטָּאת וְאַיִל־אֶחָד תָּמִים לִשְׁלָמִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall bring his offering to the LORD, one male lamb a year old without blemish as a burnt offering, and one ewe lamb a year old without blemish as a sin offering, and one ram without blemish as a peace offering.

ai_data.translation_rugged: and a basket of unleavened bread, cakes of fine flour mixed with oil, unleavened wafers smeared with oil, with their grain offering and their drink offerings.

raw: וְהִקְרִיב הַכֹּהֵן לִפְנֵי יְהוָה וְעָשָׂה אֶת־חַטָּאתוֹ וְאֶת־עֹלָתוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest shall bring [it] near before the LORD, and make atonement for his sin offering and for his burnt offering.

raw: וְאֶת־הָאַיִל יַעֲשֶׂה זֶבַח שְׁלָמִים לַיהוָה עַל סַל הַמַּצּוֹת וְעָשָׂה הַכֹּהֵן אֶת־מִנְחָתוֹ וְאֶת־נִסְכּוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the ram he shall offer [as] a sacrifice of peace offerings to the LORD, with the basket of unleavened bread. And the priest shall offer his grain offering and his drink offering.

raw: וְגִלַּח הַנָּזִיר פֶּתַח אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד אֶת־רֹאשׁ נִזְרוֹ וְלָקַח אֶת־שְׂעַר רֹאשׁ נִזְרוֹ וְנָתַן עַל־הָאֵשׁ אֲשֶׁר־תַּחַת זֶבַח הַשְּׁלָמִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the Nazirite shall shave, at the entrance of the Tent of Meeting, his dedicated head; and he shall take the hair from his dedicated head and put it on the fire that is under the sacrifice of well-being.

raw: וְלָקַח הַכֹּהֵן אֶת־הַזְּרֹעַ בְּשֵׁלָה מִן־הָאַיִל וְחַלַּת מַצָּה אַחַת מִן־הַסַּל וּרְקִיק מַצָּה אֶחָד וְנָתַן עַל־כַּפֵּי הַנָּזִיר אַחַר הִתְגַּלְּחוֹ אֶת־נִזְרוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest shall wave them as a wave offering before the Lord; it is holy to the priest, in addition to the breast of the wave offering and the thigh of the heave offering. And afterward, the Nazirite may drink wine.

raw: זֹאת תּוֹרַת הַנָּזִיר אֲשֶׁר יִדֹּר קָרְבָּנוֹ לַיהוָה עַל־נִזְרוֹ מִלְּבַד אֲשֶׁר־תַּשִּׂיג יָדוֹ כְּפִי נִדְרוֹ אֲשֶׁר יִדֹּר כֵּן יַעֲשֶׂה עַל תּוֹרַת נִזְרוֹ׃

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה לֵּאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying:

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they shall place My name upon the children of Israel, and I will bless them.

raw: וְכִי־יָגוּר אִתְּכֶם גֵּר וְעָשָׂה פֶסַח לַיהוָה כְּחֻקַּת הַפֶּסַח וּכְמִשְׁפָּטוֹ כֵּן יַעֲשֶׂה חֻקָּה אַחַת יִהְיֶה לָכֶם וְלַגֵּר וּלְאֶזְרַח הָאָרֶץ׃

raw: וּבְיוֹם הָקִים אֶת־הַמִּשְׁכָּן כִּסָּה הֶעָנָן אֶת־הַמִּשְׁכָּן לְאֹהֶל הָעֵדֻת וּבָעֶרֶב יִהְיֶה עַל־הַמִּשְׁכָּן כְּמַרְאֵה־אֵשׁ עַד־בֹּקֶר׃

raw: כֵּן יִהְיֶה תָמִיד הֶעָנָן יְכַסֶּנּוּ וּמַרְאֵה־אֵשׁ לָיְלָה׃

raw: וּלְפִי הֵעָלֹת הֶעָנָן מֵעַל הָאֹהֶל וְאַחֲרֵי־כֵן יִסְעוּ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וּבִמְקוֹם אֲשֶׁר יִשְׁכָּן־שָׁם הֶעָנָן שָׁם יַחֲנוּ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל׃

raw: וַיַּהַס כָּלֵב אֶת־הָעָם אֶל־מֹשֶׁה וַיֹּאמֶר עָלֹה נַעֲלֶה וְיָרַשְׁנוּ אֹתָהּ כִּי־יָכוֹל נוּכַל לָהּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Caleb silenced the people before Moses, and said, "Let us go up at once, and possess it; for we are well able to overcome it."

raw: וְהָאֲנָשִׁים אֲשֶׁר־עָלוּ עִמּוֹ אָמְרוּ לֹא נוּכַל לַעֲלוֹת אֶל־הָעָם כִּי־חָזָק הוּא מִמֶּנּוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: But the men who had gone up with him said, "We are not able to go up against the people, for they are stronger than we are."

raw: וַיּוֹצִיאוּ דִּבַּת הָאָרֶץ אֲשֶׁר תָּרוּ אֹתָהּ אֶל־בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל לֵאמֹר הָאָרֶץ אֲשֶׁר עָבַרְנוּ בָהּ לָתוּר אֹתָהּ אֶרֶץ אֹכֶלֶת יוֹשְׁבֶיהָ הִוא וְכָל־הָעָם אֲשֶׁר־רָאִינוּ בְתוֹכָהּ אַנְשֵׁי מִדּוֹת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they brought up an evil report of the land which they had searched unto the children of Israel, saying, The land, through which we have gone to search it, is a land that eateth up the inhabitants thereof; and all the people that we saw in it are men of great stature.

raw: וְשָׁם רָאִינוּ אֶת־הַנְּפִילִים בְּנֵי עֲנָק מִן־הַנְּפִלִים וַנְּהִי בְעֵינֵינוּ כַּחֲגָבִים וְכֵן הָיִינוּ בְּעֵינֵיהֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And there we saw the Nephilim, the sons of Anak, who come from the Nephilim. And we seemed to ourselves like grasshoppers, and so we seemed to them.

raw: וַתִּשָּׂא כָּל־הָעֵדָה וַיִּתְּנוּ אֶת־קוֹלָם וַיִּבְכּוּ הָעָם בַּלַּיְלָה הַהוּא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And all the congregation lifted up and gave their voice, and the people wept that night.

raw: וַיִּלֹּנוּ עַל־מֹשֶׁה וְעַל־אַהֲרֹן כֹּל בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וַיֹּאמְרוּ אֲלֵהֶם כָּל־הָעֵדָה לוּ־מַתְנוּ בְּאֶרֶץ מִצְרַיִם אוֹ בַּמִּדְבָּר הַזֶּה לוּ־מָתְנוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And murmured against Moses and against Aaron all the children of Israel: and the whole congregation said unto them, Would God we had died in the land of Egypt! or would God we had died in this wilderness!

raw: וְלָמָה יְהוָה מֵבִיא אֹתָנוּ אֶל־הָאָרֶץ הַזֹּאת לִנְפֹּל בַּחֶרֶב נָשֵׁינוּ וְטַפֵּנוּ יִהְיוּ לָבַז הֲלוֹא טוֹב לָנוּ שׁוּב מִצְרָיְמָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And why is the Lord bringing us to this land to fall by the sword? Our wives and our little ones will become plunder. Is it not better for us to return to Egypt?

raw: וַיֹּאמְרוּ אִישׁ אֶל־אָחִיו נִתְּנָה רֹאשׁ וְנָשׁוּבָה מִצְרָיְמָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they said, each to his brother, “Let us appoint a leader and return to Egypt.”

raw: וַיִּפֹּל מֹשֶׁה וְאַהֲרֹן עַל־פְּנֵיהֶם לִפְנֵי כָּל־קְהַל עֲדַת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses and Aaron fell on their faces before all the assembly of the congregation of the children of Israel.

raw: וִיהוֹשֻׁעַ בִּן־נוּן וְכָלֵב בֶּן־יְפֻנֶּה מִן־הַתָּרִים אֶת־הָאָרֶץ קָרְעוּ בִּגְדֵיהֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Joshua son of Nun and Caleb son of Jephunneh, of those who scouted the land, tore their clothes.

raw: וַיֹּאמְרוּ אֶל־כָּל־עֲדַת בְּנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל לֵאמֹר הָאָרֶץ אֲשֶׁר עָבַרְנוּ בָהּ לָתוּר אֹתָהּ טוֹבָה הָאָרֶץ מְאֹד מְאֹד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they spoke to all the congregation of the children of Israel, saying: 'The land which we passed through to spy it out is an exceedingly good land.'

raw: אִם־חָפֵץ בָּנוּ יְהוָה וְהֵבִיא אֹתָנוּ אֶל־הָאָרֶץ הַזֹּאת וּנְתָנָהּ לָנוּ אֶרֶץ אֲשֶׁר־הִוא זָבַת חָלָב וּדְבָשׁ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: If the Lord delights in us, then He will bring us into this land and give it to us, a land that flows with milk and honey.

raw: אַךְ בַּיהוָה אַל־תִּמְרֹדוּ וְאַתֶּם אַל־תִּירְאוּ אֶת־עַם הָאָרֶץ כִּי לַחְמֵנוּ הֵם סָר צִלָּם מֵעֲלֵיהֶם וַיהוָה אִתָּנוּ אַל־תִּירָאֻם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Only do not rebel against the Lord, and do not fear the people of the land, for they are bread for us. Their shadow has departed from them, and the Lord is with us; do not fear them.

raw: וַיֹּאמְרוּ כָּל־הָעֵדָה לִרְגּוֹם אֹתָם בָּאֲבָנִים וּכְבוֹד יְהוָה נִרְאָה בְּאֹהֶל מוֹעֵד אֶל־כָּל־בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And all the congregation said to stone them with stones, but the glory of the Lord appeared in the tent of meeting to all the children of Israel.

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה עַד־אָנָה יְנַאֲצֻנִי הָעָם הַזֶּה וְעַד־אָנָה לֹא־יַאֲמִינוּ בִי בְּכֹל הָאֹתוֹת אֲשֶׁר עָשִׂיתִי בְּקִרְבּוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD said to Moses, "How long will this people despise me? And how long will they not believe in me, despite all the signs that I have done among them?"

raw: אַכֶּנּוּ בַדֶּבֶר וְאוֹרִשֶׁנּוּ וְאֶעֱשֶׂה אֹתְךָ לְגוֹי־גָּדוֹל וְעָצוּם מִמֶּנּוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: I will smite him with the pestilence and disinherit him, and I will make you into a nation greater and mightier than he.

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר מֹשֶׁה אֶל־יְהוָה וְשָׁמְעוּ מִצְרַיִם כִּי־הֶעֱלִיתָ בְכֹחֲךָ אֶת־הָעָם הַזֶּה מִקִּרְבּוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses said to the LORD, 'Then the Egyptians will hear of it, for you brought up this people in your might from among them'

hebrew_roots.meaning: to go up, to ascend, to bring up

ai_data.tone: Concerned, pleading, worried about reputation of God

raw: וְאָמְרוּ אֶל־יוֹשֵׁב הָאָרֶץ הַזֹּאת שָׁמְעוּ כִּי־אַתָּה יְהוָה בְּקֶרֶב הָעָם הַזֶּה אֲשֶׁר־עַיִן בְּעַיִן נִרְאָה אַתָּה יְהוָה וַעֲנָנְךָ עֹמֵד עֲלֵהֶם וּבְעַמֻּד עָנָן אַתָּה הֹלֵךְ לִפְנֵיהֶם יוֹמָם וּבְעַמּוּד אֵשׁ לָיְלָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they will say to the inhabitant of this land, 'They have heard that you, O LORD, are in the midst of this people, that you, O LORD, are seen face to face, and that your cloud stands over them and that you go before them in a pillar of cloud by day and in a pillar of fire by night.'

raw: וְהֵמַתָּה אֶת־הָעָם הַזֶּה כְּאִישׁ אֶחָד וְאָמְרוּ הַגּוֹיִם אֲשֶׁר־שָׁמְעוּ אֶת־שִׁמְעֲךָ לֵאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he will kill this people as one man, and the nations who have heard your fame will say:

ai_data.translation_rugged: Because of the inability of the Lord to bring this people to the land that he swore to them, therefore he slaughtered them in the wilderness.

raw: וְעַתָּה יִגְדַּל־נָא כֹּחַ אֲדֹנָי כַּאֲשֶׁר דִּבַּרְתָּ לֵאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And now, please let the power of the Lord be great, just as you have spoken, saying:

raw: יְהוָה אֶרֶךְ אַפַּיִם וְרַב־חֶסֶד נֹשֵׂא עָוֺן וָפָשַׁע וְנַקֵּה לֹא יְנַקֶּה פֹּקֵד עֲוֺן אָבוֹת עַל־בָּנִים עַל־שִׁלֵּשִׁים וְעַל־רִבֵּעִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: The Lord is slow to anger and abundant in lovingkindness, forgiving iniquity, transgression, and sin; yet He will by no means leave the guilty unpunished, visiting the iniquity of fathers on the children and on the grandchildren to the third and fourth generations.

raw: סְלַח־נָא לַעֲוֺן הָעָם הַזֶּה כְּגֹדֶל חַסְדֶּךָ וְכַאֲשֶׁר נָשָׂאתָה לָעָם הַזֶּה מִמִּצְרַיִם וְעַד־הֵנָּה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Please pardon the iniquity of this people according to the greatness of Your lovingkindness, just as You have forgiven this people, from Egypt even until now.

נשא (n-ś-ʾ): to lift, to carry, to forgive

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר יְהוָה סָלַחְתִּי כִּדְבָרֶךָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD said, 'I have pardoned according to your word.'

raw: וְאוּלָם חַי־אָנִי וְיִמָּלֵא כְבוֹד־יְהוָה אֶת־כָּל־הָאָרֶץ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: But truly, as I live, and all the earth shall be filled with the glory of the LORD.

raw: כִּי כָל־הָאֲנָשִׁים הָרֹאִים אֶת־כְּבֹדִי וְאֶת־אֹתֹתַי אֲשֶׁר־עָשִׂיתִי בְמִצְרַיִם וּבַמִּדְבָּר וַיְנַסּוּ אֹתִי זֶה עֶשֶׂר פְּעָמִים וְלֹא שָׁמְעוּ בְּקוֹלִי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Surely all the men who have seen My glory and My signs that I performed in Egypt and in the wilderness, and have tested Me these ten times, and have not obeyed My voice.

raw: אִם־יִרְאוּ אֶת־הָאָרֶץ אֲשֶׁר נִשְׁבַּעְתִּי לַאֲבֹתָם וְכָל־מְנַאֲצַי לֹא יִרְאוּהָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Surely they shall not see the land of which I swore to their fathers, nor shall any of those who despised Me see it.

raw: וְעַבְדִּי כָלֵב עֵקֶב הָיְתָה רוּחַ אַחֶרֶת עִמּוֹ וַיְמַלֵּא אַחֲרָי וַהֲבִיאֹתִיו אֶל־הָאָרֶץ אֲשֶׁר־בָּא שָׁמָּה וְזַרְעוֹ יוֹרִשֶׁנָּה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: But My servant Caleb, because he had a different spirit with him and has followed Me fully, I will bring into the land where he went, and his descendants shall possess it.

raw: וְהָעֲמָלֵקִי וְהַכְּנַעֲנִי יוֹשֵׁב בָּעֵמֶק מָחָר פְּנוּ וּסְעוּ לָכֶם הַמִּדְבָּר דֶּרֶךְ יַם־סוּף׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the Amalekite and the Canaanite dwell in the valley; tomorrow turn and go to the wilderness by the way of the Red Sea.

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה וְאֶל־אַהֲרֹן לֵאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Yahweh spoke to Moses and to Aaron, saying:

raw: עַד־מָתַי לָעֵדָה הָרָעָה הַזֹּאת אֲשֶׁר הֵמָּה מַלִּינִים עָלָי אֶת־תְּלֻנּוֹת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל אֲשֶׁר הֵמָּה מַלִּינִים עָלַי שָׁמָעְתִּי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: How long shall I bear with this evil congregation, which murmur against me? I have heard the murmurings of the children of Israel, which they murmur against me.

raw: אֱמֹר אֲלֵהֶם חַי־אָנִי נְאֻם־יְהוָה אִם־לֹא כַּאֲשֶׁר דִּבַּרְתֶּם בְּאָזְנָי כֵּן אֶעֱשֶׂה לָכֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Say to them, 'As I live,' declares the Lord, 'surely, as you have spoken in My ears, so I will do to you.'

raw: בַּמִּדְבָּר הַזֶּה יִפְּלוּ פִגְרֵיכֶם וְכָל־פְּקֻדֵיכֶם לְכָל־מִסְפַּרְכֶם מִבֶּן עֶשְׂרִים שָׁנָה וָמָעְלָה אֲשֶׁר הֲלִינֹתֶם עָלָי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: In this wilderness your carcasses shall fall, and all your numbered men, according to your whole number, from twenty years old and upward, who have murmured against me.

raw: אִם־אַתֶּם תָּבֹאוּ אֶל־הָאָרֶץ אֲשֶׁר נָשָׂאתִי אֶת־יָדִי לְשַׁכֵּן אֶתְכֶם בָּהּ כִּי אִם־כָּלֵב בֶּן־יְפֻנֶּה וִיהוֹשֻׁעַ בִּן־נוּן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: If you come to the land which I swore to settle you in, except for Caleb son of Jephunneh and Joshua son of Nun.

raw: וְטַפְּכֶם אֲשֶׁר אֲמַרְתֶּם לָבַז יִהְיֶה וְהֵבֵיאתִי אֹתָם וְיָדְעוּ אֶת־הָאָרֶץ אֲשֶׁר מְאַסְתֶּם בָּהּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And your little ones, of whom you said would become plunder, I will bring them in, and they shall know the land that you have despised.

raw: וּפִגְרֵיכֶם אַתֶּם יִפְּלוּ בַּמִּדְבָּר הַזֶּה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And your corpses shall fall in this wilderness.

raw: וּבְנֵיכֶם יִהְיוּ רֹעִים בַּמִּדְבָּר אַרְבָּעִים שָׁנָה וְנָשְׂאוּ אֶת־זְנוּתֵיכֶם עַד־תֹּם פִּגְרֵיכֶם בַּמִּדְבָּר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And your children will be shepherds in the wilderness forty years and bear your whoredoms, until your carcasses are consumed in the wilderness.

raw: בְּמִסְפַּר הַיָּמִים אֲשֶׁר־תַּרְתֶּם אֶת־הָאָרֶץ אַרְבָּעִים יוֹם יוֹם לַשָּׁנָה יוֹם לַשָּׁנָה תִּשְׂאוּ אֶת־עֲוֺנֹתֵיכֶם אַרְבָּעִים שָׁנָה וִידַעְתֶּם אֶת־תְּנוּאָתִי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: According to the number of days that you scouted the land, forty days, a day for a year, a day for a year, you shall bear your iniquities, forty years, and you shall know My opposition.

raw: אֲנִי יְהוָה דִּבַּרְתִּי אִם־לֹא זֹאת אֶעֱשֶׂה לְכָל־הָעֵדָה הָרָעָה הַזֹּאת הַנּוֹעָדִים עָלָי בַּמִּדְבָּר הַזֶּה יִתַּמּוּ וְשָׁם יָמֻתוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: I, the LORD, have spoken; surely I will do this to all this wicked congregation who are gathered together against Me: In this wilderness they shall meet their end, and there they shall die.

raw: וְהָאֲנָשִׁים אֲשֶׁר־שָׁלַח מֹשֶׁה לָתוּר אֶת־הָאָרֶץ וַיָּשֻׁבוּ וילונו [וַיַּלִּינוּ] עָלָיו אֶת־כָּל־הָעֵדָה לְהוֹצִיא דִבָּה עַל־הָאָרֶץ׃

raw: וַתִּפְתַּח הָאָרֶץ אֶת־פִּיהָ וַתִּבְלַע אֹתָם וְאֶת־בָּתֵּיהֶם וְאֵת כָּל־הָאָדָם אֲשֶׁר לְקֹרַח וְאֵת כָּל־הָרֲכוּשׁ׃

raw: וַאֲנִי הִנֵּה לָקַחְתִּי אֶת־אֲחֵיכֶם הַלְוִיִּם מִתּוֹךְ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל לָכֶם מַתָּנָה נְתֻנִים לַיהוָה לַעֲבֹד אֶת־עֲבֹדַת אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And I, behold, I have taken your brothers the Levites from among the children of Israel; they are a gift to you, given to the Lord, to do the service of the tent of meeting.

raw: וְאַתָּה וּבָנֶיךָ אִתְּךָ תִּשְׁמְרוּ אֶת־כְּהֻנַּתְכֶם לְכָל־דְּבַר הַמִּזְבֵּחַ וּלְמִבֵּית לַפָּרֹכֶת וַעֲבַדְתֶּם עֲבֹדַת מַתָּנָה אֶתֵּן אֶת־כְּהֻנַּתְכֶם וְהַזָּר הַקָּרֵב יוּמָת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you and your sons with you shall keep your priesthood in all matters pertaining to the altar and that within the veil, and you shall serve. I give your priesthood as a gift, and the outsider who approaches shall be put to death.

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל־אַהֲרֹן וַאֲנִי הִנֵּה נָתַתִּי לְךָ אֶת־מִשְׁמֶרֶת תְּרוּמֹתָי לְכָל־קָדְשֵׁי בְנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל לְךָ נְתַתִּים לְמָשְׁחָה וּלְבָנֶיךָ לְחָק־עוֹלָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD spoke to Aaron, “Behold, I Myself have given you charge of My offerings, even all the holy gifts of the sons of Israel; I have given them to you as a portion and to your sons as a perpetual allotment.

raw: זֶה־יִהְיֶה לְךָ מִקֹּדֶשׁ הַקֳּדָשִׁים מִן־הָאֵשׁ כָּל־קָרְבָּנָם לְכָל־מִנְחָתָם וּלְכָל־חַטָּאתָם וּלְכָל־אֲשָׁמָם אֲשֶׁר יָשִׁיבוּ לִי קֹדֶשׁ קָדָשִׁים לְךָ הוּא וּלְבָנֶיךָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: This shall be yours of the most holy things, from the fire: every offering of theirs, with every meal offering of theirs, and with every sin offering of theirs, and with every trespass offering of theirs, which they shall render to Me: it is most holy for you and your sons.

raw: בְּקֹדֶשׁ הַקֳּדָשִׁים תֹּאכֲלֶנּוּ כָּל־זָכָר יֹאכַל אֹתוֹ קֹדֶשׁ יִהְיֶה־לָּךְ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: In the most holy place shall you eat it; every male shall eat it. It shall be holy to you.

raw: וְזֶה־לְּךָ תְּרוּמַת מַתָּנָם לְכָל־תְּנוּפֹת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל לְךָ נְתַתִּים וּלְבָנֶיךָ וְלִבְנֹתֶיךָ אִתְּךָ לְחָק־עוֹלָם כָּל־טָהוֹר בְּבֵיתְךָ יֹאכַל אֹתוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And this is yours: the offering of their gift, with all the wave offerings of the children of Israel. I have given them to you, and to your sons and daughters with you, as a perpetual due. Everyone who is clean in your house may eat it.

raw: כֹּל חֵלֶב יִצְהָר וְכָל־חֵלֶב תִּירוֹשׁ וְדָגָן רֵאשִׁיתָם אֲשֶׁר־יִתְּנוּ לַיהוָה לְךָ נְתַתִּים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: All the best of the oil, and all the best of the wine, and of the grain, the firstfruits of which they give to the Lord, I have given them to you.

raw: בִּכּוּרֵי כָּל־אֲשֶׁר בְּאַרְצָם אֲשֶׁר־יָבִיאוּ לַיהוָה לְךָ יִהְיֶה כָּל־טָהוֹר בְּבֵיתְךָ יֹאכֲלֶנּוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: The first fruits of all that is in their land, which they bring to the LORD, shall be yours. Everyone who is clean in your house may eat it.

raw: כָּל־חֵרֶם בְּיִשְׂרָאֵל לְךָ יִהְיֶה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Every devoted thing in Israel shall be yours.

raw: כָּל־פֶּטֶר רֶחֶם לְכָל־בָּשָׂר אֲשֶׁר־יַקְרִיבוּ לַיהוָה בָּאָדָם וּבַבְּהֵמָה יִהְיֶה־לָּךְ אַךְ פָּדֹה תִפְדֶּה אֵת בְּכוֹר הָאָדָם וְאֵת בְּכוֹר־הַבְּהֵמָה הַטְּמֵאָה תִּפְדֶּה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Every first issue of the womb, of all flesh that is offered to the LORD, whether of man or beast, shall be yours; nevertheless, the firstborn of man you shall surely redeem, and the firstling of unclean beasts you shall redeem.

raw: וּפְדוּיָו מִבֶּן־חֹדֶשׁ תִּפְדֶּה בְּעֶרְכְּךָ כֶּסֶף חֲמֵשֶׁת שְׁקָלִים בְּשֶׁקֶל הַקֹּדֶשׁ עֶשְׂרִים גֵּרָה הוּא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And those to be redeemed from a month old you shall redeem according to your valuation, five shekels of silver, according to the sanctuary shekel, which is twenty gerahs.

raw: אַךְ בְּכוֹר־שׁוֹר אוֹ־בְכוֹר כֶּשֶׂב אוֹ־בְכוֹר עֵז לֹא תִפְדֶּה קֹדֶשׁ הֵם אֶת־דָּמָם תִּזְרֹק עַל־הַמִּזְבֵּחַ וְאֶת־חֶלְבָּם תַּקְטִיר אִשֶּׁה לְרֵיחַ נִיחֹחַ לַיהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: However, the firstborn of an ox, or the firstborn of a sheep, or the firstborn of a goat, you shall not redeem; they are holy. You shall sprinkle their blood on the altar, and you shall offer up their fat as a food offering, a pleasing aroma to the Lord.

raw: וּבְשָׂרָם יִהְיֶה־לָּךְ כַּחֲזֵה הַתְּנוּפָה וּכְשׁוֹק הַיָּמִין לְךָ יִהְיֶה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And their flesh shall be yours, as the breast of wave offering and as the right thigh; it shall be yours.

raw: כֹּל תְּרוּמֹת הַקֳּדָשִׁים אֲשֶׁר יָרִימוּ בְנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל לַיהוָה נָתַתִּי לְךָ וּלְבָנֶיךָ וְלִבְנֹתֶיךָ אִתְּךָ לְחָק־עוֹלָם בְּרִית מֶלַח עוֹלָם הִוא לִפְנֵי יְהוָה לְךָ וּלְזַרְעֲךָ אִתָּךְ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: All the holy offerings that the Israelites present to the Lord I have given to you, your sons, and your daughters, as a perpetual due. It is a covenant of salt forever before the Lord, for you and your offspring with you.

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר יְהוָה אֶל־אַהֲרֹן בְּאַרְצָם לֹא תִנְחָל וְחֵלֶק לֹא־יִהְיֶה לְךָ בְּתוֹכָם אֲנִי חֶלְקְךָ וְנַחֲלָתְךָ בְּתוֹךְ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the Lord said to Aaron, "You shall have no inheritance in their land, nor shall you have any portion among them. I am your portion and your inheritance among the people of Israel."

raw: וְלִבְנֵי לֵוִי הִנֵּה נָתַתִּי כָּל־מַעֲשֵׂר בְּיִשְׂרָאֵל לְנַחֲלָה חֵלֶף עֲבֹדָתָם אֲשֶׁר־הֵם עֹבְדִים אֶת־עֲבֹדַת אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And to the sons of Levi, behold, I have given all the tithe in Israel for an inheritance, in return for their service which they perform, the service of the tent of meeting.

raw: וְלֹא־יִקְרְבוּ עוֹד בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל אֶל־אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד לָשֵׂאת חֵטְא לָמוּת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the children of Israel shall no longer come near the tent of meeting, lest they bear sin and die.

raw: וְעָבַד הַלֵּוִי הוּא אֶת־עֲבֹדַת אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד וְהֵם יִשְׂאוּ עֲוֺנָם חֻקַּת עוֹלָם לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶם וּבְתוֹךְ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל לֹא יִנְחֲלוּ נַחֲלָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the Levite, he shall do the service of the tent of meeting, and they shall bear their iniquity; it shall be a perpetual statute for your generations, and among the children of Israel they shall have no inheritance.

raw: כִּי אֶת־מַעְשַׂר בְּנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל אֲשֶׁר יָרִימוּ לַיהוָה תְּרוּמָה נָתַתִּי לַלְוִיִּם לְנַחֲלָה עַל־כֵּן אָמַרְתִּי לָהֶם בְּתוֹךְ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל לֹא יִנְחֲלוּ נַחֲלָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: For the tithe of the children of Israel, which they offer as an offering to the LORD, I have given to the Levites for an inheritance; therefore I have said to them, 'Among the children of Israel they shall have no inheritance.'

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה לֵּאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying:

raw: וְאֶל־הַלְוִיִּם תְּדַבֵּר וְאָמַרְתָּ אֲלֵהֶם כִּי־תִקְחוּ מֵאֵת בְּנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל אֶת־הַמַּעֲשֵׂר אֲשֶׁר נָתַתִּי לָכֶם מֵאִתָּם בְּנַחֲלַתְכֶם וַהֲרֵמֹתֶם מִמֶּנּוּ תְּרוּמַת יְהוָה מַעֲשֵׂר מִן־הַמַּעֲשֵׂר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And to the Levites you shall speak, and you shall say to them, 'When you take from the children of Israel the tithe that I have given you from them as your inheritance, then you shall offer up from it a heave offering to the Lord, a tithe of the tithe.'

raw: וְנֶחְשַׁב לָכֶם תְּרוּמַתְכֶם כַּדָּגָן מִן־הַגֹּרֶן וְכַמְלֵאָה מִן־הַיָּקֶב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And it shall be reckoned to you as your heave offering, as the grain from the threshing floor, and as the fullness from the winepress.

raw: כֵּן תָּרִימוּ גַם־אַתֶּם תְּרוּמַת יְהוָה מִכֹּל מַעְשְׂרֹתֵיכֶם אֲשֶׁר תִּקְחוּ מֵאֵת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וּנְתַתֶּם מִמֶּנּוּ אֶת־תְּרוּמַת יְהוָה לְאַהֲרֹן הַכֹּהֵן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Thus you shall also present an offering to the LORD from all your tithes that you receive from the Israelites, and from it you shall give the LORD's offering to Aaron the priest.

raw: מִכֹּל מַתְּנֹתֵיכֶם תָּרִימוּ אֵת כָּל־תְּרוּמַת יְהוָה מִכָּל־חֶלְבּוֹ אֶת־מִקְדְּשׁוֹ מִמֶּנּוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Out of all your gifts, you shall set apart every offering of the Lord, from all its best part, its consecrated portion.

raw: וְאָמַרְתָּ אֲלֵהֶם בַּהֲרִימְכֶם אֶת־חֶלְבּוֹ מִמֶּנּוּ וְנֶחְשַׁב לַלְוִיִּם כִּתְבוּאַת גֹּרֶן וְכִתְבוּאַת יָקֶב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall say to them, 'When you have offered up its best part from it, then it shall be reckoned to the Levites as the yield of the threshing floor and as the yield of the wine vat.'

raw: וַאֲכַלְתֶּם אֹתוֹ בְּכָל־מָקוֹם אַתֶּם וּבֵיתְכֶם כִּי־שָׂכָר הוּא לָכֶם חֵלֶף עֲבֹדַתְכֶם בְּאֹהֶל מוֹעֵד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall eat it in every place, you and your household, for it is your wages in return for your service in the tent of meeting.

raw: וְלֹא־תִשְׂאוּ עָלָיו חֵטְא בַּהֲרִימְכֶם אֶת־חֶלְבּוֹ מִמֶּנּוּ וְאֶת־קָדְשֵׁי בְנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל לֹא תְחַלְּלוּ וְלֹא תָמוּתוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall not bear sin because of it, when you have removed its best part from it; and you shall not profane the holy things of the children of Israel, lest you die.

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה וְאֶל־אַהֲרֹן לֵאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD spoke to Moses and to Aaron, saying:

raw: זֹאת חֻקַּת הַתּוֹרָה אֲשֶׁר־צִוָּה יְהוָה לֵאמֹר דַּבֵּר אֶל־בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְיִקְחוּ אֵלֶיךָ פָרָה אֲדֻמָּה תְּמִימָה אֲשֶׁר אֵין־בָּהּ מוּם אֲשֶׁר לֹא־עָלָה עָלֶיהָ עֹל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: This [is] the statute of the law, which the LORD commanded, saying, Speak unto the children of Israel, that they bring thee a red heifer without spot, wherein [is] no blemish, [and] upon which never came yoke:

raw: וּנְתַתֶּם אֹתָהּ אֶל־אֶלְעָזָר הַכֹּהֵן וְהוֹצִיא אֹתָהּ אֶל־מִחוּץ לַמַּחֲנֶה וְשָׁחַט אֹתָהּ לְפָנָיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall give it to Eleazar the priest, and he shall bring it outside the camp, and he shall slaughter it before him.

raw: וְלָקַח אֶלְעָזָר הַכֹּהֵן מִדָּמָהּ בְּאֶצְבָּעוֹ וְהִזָּה אֶל־נֹכַח פְּנֵי אֹהֶל־מוֹעֵד מִדָּמָהּ שֶׁבַע פְּעָמִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Eleazar the priest shall take some of its blood with his finger and sprinkle it seven times towards the front of the tent of meeting.

raw: וְשָׂרַף אֶת־הַפָּרָה לְעֵינָיו אֶת־עֹרָהּ וְאֶת־בְּשָׂרָהּ וְאֶת־דָּמָהּ עַל־פִּרְשָׁהּ יִשְׂרֹף׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall burn the heifer before his eyes; her skin, and her flesh, and her blood, with her dung, shall he burn.

raw: וְלָקַח הַכֹּהֵן עֵץ אֶרֶז וְאֵזוֹב וּשְׁנִי תוֹלָעַת וְהִשְׁלִיךְ אֶל־תּוֹךְ שְׂרֵפַת הַפָּרָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest shall take cedar wood and hyssop and scarlet stuff, and cast it into the burning of the heifer.

raw: וְכִבֶּס בְּגָדָיו הַכֹּהֵן וְרָחַץ בְּשָׂרוֹ בַּמַּיִם וְאַחַר יָבוֹא אֶל־הַמַּחֲנֶה וְטָמֵא הַכֹּהֵן עַד־הָעָרֶב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the priest shall wash his garments and bathe his body in water, and afterward he may come into the camp, but the priest shall be unclean until evening.

raw: וְהַשֹּׂרֵף אֹתָהּ יְכַבֵּס בְּגָדָיו בַּמַּיִם וְרָחַץ בְּשָׂרוֹ בַּמָּיִם וְטָמֵא עַד־הָעָרֶב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the one who burns it shall wash his clothes in water and bathe his body in water, and he shall be unclean until evening.

raw: וְאָסַף אִישׁ טָהוֹר אֵת אֵפֶר הַפָּרָה וְהִנִּיחַ מִחוּץ לַמַּחֲנֶה בְּמָקוֹם טָהוֹר וְהָיְתָה לַעֲדַת בְּנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל לְמִשְׁמֶרֶת לְמֵי נִדָּה חַטָּאת הִוא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And a pure man shall gather the ashes of the heifer and place them outside the camp in a pure place, and it shall be kept for the congregation of the children of Israel as a purification offering; it is a sin offering.

raw: וְכִבֶּס הָאֹסֵף אֶת־אֵפֶר הַפָּרָה אֶת־בְּגָדָיו וְטָמֵא עַד־הָעָרֶב וְהָיְתָה לִבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְלַגֵּר הַגָּר בְּתוֹכָם לְחֻקַּת עוֹלָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he who gathers the ashes of the heifer shall wash his clothes and be unclean until evening. And it shall be for the children of Israel and for the stranger who dwells among them, a statute forever.

raw: הַנֹּגֵעַ בְּמֵת לְכָל־נֶפֶשׁ אָדָם וְטָמֵא שִׁבְעַת יָמִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: He who touches the dead body of any person shall be unclean seven days.

raw: הוּא יִתְחַטָּא־בוֹ בַּיּוֹם הַשְּׁלִישִׁי וּבַיּוֹם הַשְּׁבִיעִי יִטְהָר וְאִם־לֹא יִתְחַטָּא בַּיּוֹם הַשְּׁלִישִׁי וּבַיּוֹם הַשְּׁבִיעִי לֹא יִטְהָר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: He shall purify himself with it on the third day, and on the seventh day he shall be clean; but if he does not purify himself on the third day and on the seventh day, he shall not be clean.

raw: כָּל־הַנֹּגֵעַ בְּמֵת בְּנֶפֶשׁ הָאָדָם אֲשֶׁר־יָמוּת וְלֹא יִתְחַטָּא אֶת־מִשְׁכַּן יְהוָה טִמֵּא וְנִכְרְתָה הַנֶּפֶשׁ הַהִוא מִיִּשְׂרָאֵל כִּי מֵי נִדָּה לֹא־זֹרַק עָלָיו טָמֵא יִהְיֶה עוֹד טֻמְאָתוֹ בוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Whoever touches the dead body of anyone who has died, and does not purify himself, defiles the tabernacle of the LORD; that person shall be cut off from Israel. Because the water of impurity was not sprinkled on him, he remains unclean; his uncleanness is still on him.

raw: זֹאת הַתּוֹרָה אָדָם כִּי־יָמוּת בְּאֹהֶל כָּל־הַבָּא אֶל־הָאֹהֶל וְכָל־אֲשֶׁר בָּאֹהֶל יִטְמָא שִׁבְעַת יָמִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: This is the law: When a person dies in a tent, everyone who enters the tent and everything in the tent will be unclean for seven days.

raw: וְכֹל כְּלִי פָתוּחַ אֲשֶׁר אֵין־צָמִיד פָּתִיל עָלָיו טָמֵא הוּא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And every open vessel, which has no lid fastened upon it, is unclean.

raw: וְכֹל אֲשֶׁר־יִגַּע עַל־פְּנֵי הַשָּׂדֶה בַּחֲלַל־חֶרֶב אוֹ בְמֵת אוֹ־בְעֶצֶם אָדָם אוֹ בְקָבֶר יִטְמָא שִׁבְעַת יָמִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And everything that touches the open field, a slain person, or a dead body, or a bone of a man, or a grave, shall be unclean seven days.

raw: וְלָקְחוּ לַטָּמֵא מֵעֲפַר שְׂרֵפַת הַחַטָּאת וְנָתַן עָלָיו מַיִם חַיִּים אֶל־כֶּלִי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they shall take for the unclean person some of the dust of the burning of the sin offering, and fresh water shall be added to it in a vessel.

raw: וְלָקַח אֵזוֹב וְטָבַל בַּמַּיִם אִישׁ טָהוֹר וְהִזָּה עַל־הָאֹהֶל וְעַל־כָּל־הַכֵּלִים וְעַל־הַנְּפָשׁוֹת אֲשֶׁר הָיוּ־שָׁם וְעַל־הַנֹּגֵעַ בַּעֶצֶם אוֹ בֶחָלָל אוֹ בַמֵּת אוֹ בַקָּבֶר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And a clean person shall take hyssop, dip it in the water, and sprinkle it on the tent and on all the furnishings and on the persons who were there, and on anyone who touched a bone or a slain person or a dead body or a grave.

raw: וְהִזָּה הַטָּהֹר עַל־הַטָּמֵא בַּיּוֹם הַשְּׁלִישִׁי וּבַיּוֹם הַשְּׁבִיעִי וְחִטְּאוֹ בַּיּוֹם הַשְּׁבִיעִי וְכִבֶּס בְּגָדָיו וְרָחַץ בַּמַּיִם וְטָהֵר בָּעָרֶב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the clean one shall sprinkle on the unclean one on the third day and on the seventh day; and he shall purify himself on the seventh day, and he shall wash his clothes and bathe in water, and he shall be clean in the evening.

raw: וְאִישׁ אֲשֶׁר־יִטְמָא וְלֹא יִתְחַטָּא וְנִכְרְתָה הַנֶּפֶשׁ הַהִוא מִתּוֹךְ הַקָּהָל כִּי אֶת־מִקְדַּשׁ יְהוָה טִמֵּא מֵי נִדָּה לֹא־זֹרַק עָלָיו טָמֵא הוּא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the man who becomes unclean and does not purify himself, that person shall be cut off from the midst of the congregation, because he has defiled the sanctuary of the Lord. The water of purification was not sprinkled on him; he is unclean.

raw: וְהָיְתָה לָּהֶם לְחֻקַּת עוֹלָם וּמַזֵּה מֵי־הַנִּדָּה יְכַבֵּס בְּגָדָיו וְהַנֹּגֵעַ בְּמֵי הַנִּדָּה יִטְמָא עַד־הָעָרֶב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And it shall be for them a statute forever. And he that sprinkles the water of impurity shall wash his clothes, and whoever touches the water of impurity shall be unclean until evening.

raw: וְכֹל אֲשֶׁר־יִגַּע־בּוֹ הַטָּמֵא יִטְמָא וְהַנֶּפֶשׁ הַנֹּגַעַת תִּטְמָא עַד־הָעָרֶב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And everything that the unclean touches shall be unclean, and the person who touches it shall be unclean until evening.

raw: וַיָּבֹאוּ בְנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל כָּל־הָעֵדָה מִדְבַּר־צִן בַּחֹדֶשׁ הָרִאשׁוֹן וַיֵּשֶׁב הָעָם בְּקָדֵשׁ וַתָּמָת שָׁם מִרְיָם וַתִּקָּבֵר שָׁם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the children of Israel, the whole congregation, came into the wilderness of Zin, in the first month; and the people stayed in Kadesh. And Miriam died there, and was buried there.

raw: וְלֹא־הָיָה מַיִם לָעֵדָה וַיִּקָּהֲלוּ עַל־מֹשֶׁה וְעַל־אַהֲרֹן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And there was no water for the congregation, and they assembled against Moses and against Aaron.

raw: וַיָּרֶב הָעָם עִם־מֹשֶׁה וַיֹּאמְרוּ לֵאמֹר וְלוּ גָוַעְנוּ בִּגְוַע אַחֵינוּ לִפְנֵי יְהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the people quarreled with Moses, and they said, saying, "If only we had died when our brothers died before the LORD!"

raw: וְלָמָה הֲבֵאתֶם אֶת־קְהַל יְהוָה אֶל־הַמִּדְבָּר הַזֶּה לָמוּת שָׁם אֲנַחְנוּ וּבְעִירֵנוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And why have you brought the assembly of the Lord to this wilderness, that we and our beasts should die there?

raw: וְלָמָה הֶעֱלִיתֻנוּ מִמִּצְרַיִם לְהָבִיא אֹתָנוּ אֶל־הַמָּקוֹם הָרָע הַזֶּה לֹא מְקוֹם זֶרַע וּתְאֵנָה וְגֶפֶן וְרִמּוֹן וּמַיִם אַיִן לִשְׁתּוֹת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And why have you brought us up out of Egypt to bring us to this wretched place, which is not a place for planting, or figs, or vines, or pomegranates; and there is no water to drink?

raw: וַיָּבֹא מֹשֶׁה וְאַהֲרֹן מִפְּנֵי הַקָּהָל אֶל־פֶּתַח אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד וַיִּפְּלוּ עַל־פְּנֵיהֶם וַיֵּרָא כְבוֹד־יְהוָה אֲלֵיהֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses and Aaron came away from the presence of the congregation to the entrance of the Tent of Meeting, and they fell on their faces, and the glory of the Lord appeared to them.

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה לֵּאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying:

raw: קַח אֶת־הַמַּטֶּה וְהַקְהֵל אֶת־הָעֵדָה אַתָּה וְאַהֲרֹן אָחִיךָ וְדִבַּרְתֶּם אֶל־הַסֶּלַע לְעֵינֵיהֶם וְנָתַן מֵימָיו וְהוֹצֵאתָ לָהֶם מַיִם מִן־הַסֶּלַע וְהִשְׁקִיתָ אֶת־הָעֵדָה וְאֶת־בְּעִירָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Take the staff and assemble the congregation, you and Aaron your brother, and speak to the rock before their eyes, so that it will yield its water. You shall bring forth water for them out of the rock and give drink to the congregation and their beasts.

raw: וַיִּקַּח מֹשֶׁה אֶת־הַמַּטֶּה מִלִּפְנֵי יְהוָה כַּאֲשֶׁר צִוָּהוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses took the staff from before the Lord, as He commanded him.

hebrew_roots.meaning: from before, from the presence of

raw: וַיַּקְהִלוּ מֹשֶׁה וְאַהֲרֹן אֶת־הַקָּהָל אֶל־פְּנֵי הַסָּלַע וַיֹּאמֶר לָהֶם שִׁמְעוּ־נָא הַמֹּרִים הֲמִן־הַסֶּלַע הַזֶּה נוֹצִיא לָכֶם מָיִם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses and Aaron gathered the assembly before the rock, and he said to them, "Hear now, you rebels: shall we bring forth water for you out of this rock?"

raw: וַיָּרֶם מֹשֶׁה אֶת־יָדוֹ וַיַּךְ אֶת־הַסֶּלַע בְּמַטֵּהוּ פַּעֲמָיִם וַיֵּצְאוּ מַיִם רַבִּים וַתֵּשְׁתְּ הָעֵדָה וּבְעִירָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses lifted up his hand and struck the rock with his staff twice, and water came out abundantly, and the congregation and their livestock drank.

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה וְאֶל־אַהֲרֹן יַעַן לֹא־הֶאֱמַנְתֶּם בִּי לְהַקְדִּישֵׁנִי לְעֵינֵי בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל לָכֵן לֹא תָבִיאוּ אֶת־הַקָּהָל הַזֶּה אֶל־הָאָרֶץ אֲשֶׁר־נָתַתִּי לָהֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD said to Moses and Aaron, “Because you did not believe in Me, to sanctify Me in the eyes of the children of Israel, therefore you shall not bring this assembly into the land which I have given them.”

raw: הֵמָּה מֵי מְרִיבָה אֲשֶׁר־רָבוּ בְנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל אֶת־יְהוָה וַיִּקָּדֵשׁ בָּם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: These are the waters of Meribah, where the children of Israel strove with the LORD, and He was sanctified in them.

raw: וַיִּשְׁלַח מֹשֶׁה מַלְאָכִים מִקָּדֵשׁ אֶל־מֶלֶךְ אֱדוֹם כֹּה אָמַר אָחִיךָ יִשְׂרָאֵל אַתָּה יָדַעְתָּ אֵת כָּל־הַתְּלָאָה אֲשֶׁר מְצָאָתְנוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses sent messengers from Kadesh to the king of Edom: 'Thus says your brother Israel: You know all the hardship that has befallen us,'

raw: וַיֵּרְדוּ אֲבֹתֵינוּ מִצְרַיְמָה וַנֵּשֶׁב בְּמִצְרַיִם יָמִים רַבִּים וַיָּרֵעוּ לָנוּ מִצְרַיִם וְלַאֲבֹתֵינוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And our fathers went down to Egypt and we lived in Egypt for many days, and the Egyptians mistreated us and our fathers.

raw: וַנִּצְעַק אֶל־יְהוָה וַיִּשְׁמַע קֹלֵנוּ וַיִּשְׁלַח מַלְאָךְ וַיֹּצִאֵנוּ מִמִּצְרָיִם וְהִנֵּה אֲנַחְנוּ בְקָדֵשׁ עִיר קְצֵה גְבוּלֶךָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And we cried out to the Lord, and He heard our voice, and He sent an angel and brought us out of Egypt; and behold, we are in Kadesh, a city on the edge of your territory.

raw: נַעְבְּרָה־נָּא בְאַרְצֶךָ לֹא נַעֲבֹר בְּשָׂדֶה וּבְכֶרֶם וְלֹא נִשְׁתֶּה מֵי בְאֵר דֶּרֶךְ הַמֶּלֶךְ נֵלֵךְ לֹא נִטֶּה יָמִין וּשְׂמֹאול עַד אֲשֶׁר־נַעֲבֹר גְּבוּלֶךָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Please let us pass through your country. We will not pass through field or vineyard, and we will not drink water from a well. We will go along the King's Highway; we will not turn aside to the right hand or to the left, until we have passed through your territory.

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר אֵלָיו אֱדוֹם לֹא תַעֲבֹר בִּי פֶּן־בַּחֶרֶב אֵצֵא לִקְרָאתֶךָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Edom said to him, "You shall not pass through me, lest I come out against you with the sword."
hebrew_roots: עבר ('avar) - to pass through, to cross over
יצא (yatza) - to go out, to come out

raw: וַיֹּאמְרוּ אֵלָיו בְּנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל בַּמְסִלָּה נַעֲלֶה וְאִם־מֵימֶיךָ נִשְׁתֶּה אֲנִי וּמִקְנַי וְנָתַתִּי מִכְרָם רַק אֵין־דָּבָר בְּרַגְלַי אֶעֱבֹרָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the children of Israel said to him, "We will go up by the highway; and if we drink your water, I and my livestock, then I will pay for it. Only let me pass through on foot."

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר לֹא תַעֲבֹר וַיֵּצֵא אֱדוֹם לִקְרָאתוֹ בְּעַם כָּבֵד וּבְיָד חֲזָקָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he said, "You shall not pass." And Edom came out to meet him with a heavy people and with a strong hand.

raw: וַיְמָאֵן אֱדוֹם נְתֹן אֶת־יִשְׂרָאֵל עֲבֹר בִּגְבֻלוֹ וַיֵּט יִשְׂרָאֵל מֵעָלָיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Edom refused to allow Israel to pass through his territory, so Israel turned away from him.

raw: וַיִּסְעוּ מִקָּדֵשׁ וַיָּבֹאוּ בְנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל כָּל־הָעֵדָה הֹר הָהָר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they journeyed from Kadesh, and the children of Israel, the whole congregation, came to Hor the mountain.

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה וְאֶל־אַהֲרֹן בְּהֹר הָהָר עַל־גְּבוּל אֶרֶץ־אֱדוֹם לֵאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD spoke to Moses and Aaron in Mount Hor, by the border of the land of Edom, saying:

raw: יֵאָסֵף אַהֲרֹן אֶל־עַמָּיו כִּי לֹא יָבֹא אֶל־הָאָרֶץ אֲשֶׁר נָתַתִּי לִבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל עַל אֲשֶׁר־מְרִיתֶם אֶת־פִּי לְמֵי מְרִיבָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Aaron shall be gathered to his people, for he shall not enter the land that I have given to the children of Israel, because you rebelled against my word at the waters of Meribah.

raw: קַח אֶת־אַהֲרֹן וְאֶת־אֶלְעָזָר בְּנוֹ וְהַעַל אֹתָם הֹר הָהָר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Take Aaron and Eleazar his son, and bring them up to Mount Hor.

raw: וְהַפְשֵׁט אֶת־אַהֲרֹן אֶת־בְּגָדָיו וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּם אֶת־אֶלְעָזָר בְּנוֹ וְאַהֲרֹן יֵאָסֵף וּמֵת שָׁם׃

raw: וַיַּעַשׂ מֹשֶׁה כַּאֲשֶׁר צִוָּה יְהוָה וַיַּעֲלוּ אֶל־הֹר הָהָר לְעֵינֵי כָּל־הָעֵדָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses did as the LORD commanded, and they went up to Mount Hor in the sight of all the congregation.

raw: וַיַּפְשֵׁט מֹשֶׁה אֶת־אַהֲרֹן אֶת־בְּגָדָיו וַיַּלְבֵּשׁ אֹתָם אֶת־אֶלְעָזָר בְּנוֹ וַיָּמָת אַהֲרֹן שָׁם בְּרֹאשׁ הָהָר וַיֵּרֶד מֹשֶׁה וְאֶלְעָזָר מִן־הָהָר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses stripped Aaron of his garments, and put them upon Eleazar his son; and Aaron died there on the top of the mount; and Moses and Eleazar came down from the mount.

raw: וַיִּרְאוּ כָּל־הָעֵדָה כִּי גָוַע אַהֲרֹן וַיִּבְכּוּ אֶת־אַהֲרֹן שְׁלֹשִׁים יוֹם כֹּל בֵּית יִשְׂרָאֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And all the congregation saw that Aaron was dead, and they wept for Aaron thirty days, all the house of Israel.

raw: וַיִּשְׁמַע הַכְּנַעֲנִי מֶלֶךְ־עֲרָד יֹשֵׁב הַנֶּגֶב כִּי בָּא יִשְׂרָאֵל דֶּרֶךְ הָאֲתָרִים וַיִּלָּחֶם בְּיִשְׂרָאֵל וַיִּשְׁבְּ מִמֶּנּוּ שֶׁבִי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the Canaanite, the king of Arad, who dwelt in the Negeb, heard that Israel came by the way of the spies; and he fought against Israel, and took some of them prisoners.

raw: וַיִּדַּר יִשְׂרָאֵל נֶדֶר לַיהוָה וַיֹּאמַר אִם־נָתֹן תִּתֵּן אֶת־הָעָם הַזֶּה בְּיָדִי וְהַחֲרַמְתִּי אֶת־עָרֵיהֶם׃

raw: וַיִּשְׁמַע יְהוָה בְּקוֹל יִשְׂרָאֵל וַיִּתֵּן אֶת־הַכְּנַעֲנִי וַיַּחֲרֵם אֶתְהֶם וְאֶת־עָרֵיהֶם וַיִּקְרָא שֵׁם־הַמָּקוֹם חָרְמָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the Lord hearkened to the voice of Israel, and delivered up the Canaanites; and they utterly destroyed them and their cities; and the name of the place was called Hormah.

raw: וַיִּסְעוּ מֵהֹר הָהָר דֶּרֶךְ יַם־סוּף לִסְבֹב אֶת־אֶרֶץ אֱדוֹם וַתִּקְצַר נֶפֶשׁ־הָעָם בַּדָּרֶךְ׃

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר הָעָם בֵּאלֹהִים וּבְמֹשֶׁה לָמָה הֶעֱלִיתֻנוּ מִמִּצְרַיִם לָמוּת בַּמִּדְבָּר כִּי אֵין לֶחֶם וְאֵין מַיִם וְנַפְשֵׁנוּ קָצָה בַּלֶּחֶם הַקְּלֹקֵל׃

raw: וַיְשַׁלַּח יְהוָה בָּעָם אֵת הַנְּחָשִׁים הַשְּׂרָפִים וַיְנַשְּׁכוּ אֶת־הָעָם וַיָּמָת עַם־רָב מִיִּשְׂרָאֵל׃

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר מַלְאַךְ יְהוָה אֶל־בִּלְעָם לֵךְ עִם־הָאֲנָשִׁים וְאֶפֶס אֶת־הַדָּבָר אֲשֶׁר־אֲדַבֵּר אֵלֶיךָ אֹתוֹ תְדַבֵּר וַיֵּלֶךְ בִּלְעָם עִם־שָׂרֵי בָלָק׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the angel of the LORD said to Balaam, "Go with the men, but only the word that I speak to you shall you speak." So Balaam went with the princes of Balak.

raw: וַיִּשְׁמַע בָּלָק כִּי בָא בִלְעָם וַיֵּצֵא לִקְרָאתוֹ אֶל־עִיר מוֹאָב אֲשֶׁר עַל־גְּבוּל אַרְנֹן אֲשֶׁר בִּקְצֵה הַגְּבוּל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Balak heard that Balaam was coming, and he went out to meet him to the city of Moab, which [is] on the border of Arnon, which [is] at the extremity of the border.

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר בָּלָק אֶל־בִּלְעָם הֲלֹא שָׁלֹחַ שָׁלַחְתִּי אֵלֶיךָ לִקְרֹא־לָךְ לָמָּה לֹא־הָלַכְתָּ אֵלָי הַאֻמְנָם לֹא אוּכַל כַּבְּדֶךָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Balak said to Balaam, "Did I not indeed send to you to summon you? Why did you not come to me? Am I really not able to honor you?"

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר בִּלְעָם אֶל־בָּלָק הִנֵּה־בָאתִי אֵלֶיךָ עַתָּה הֲיָכוֹל אוּכַל דַּבֵּר מְאוּמָה הַדָּבָר אֲשֶׁר יָשִׂים אֱלֹהִים בְּפִי אֹתוֹ אֲדַבֵּר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Balaam said to Balak, “Behold, I have come to you. Now, am I able to speak anything at all? The word that God puts in my mouth, that is what I will speak.”

raw: וַיֵּלֶךְ בִּלְעָם עִם־בָּלָק וַיָּבֹאוּ קִרְיַת חֻצוֹת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And went Balaam with Balak, and they came to Kiriath-huzoth.

raw: וַיִּזְבַּח בָּלָק בָּקָר וָצֹאן וַיְשַׁלַּח לְבִלְעָם וְלַשָּׂרִים אֲשֶׁר אִתּוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Balak sacrificed cattle and sheep, and sent to Balaam and to the officials who were with him.

raw: וַיְהִי בַבֹּקֶר וַיִּקַּח בָּלָק אֶת־בִּלְעָם וַיַּעֲלֵהוּ בָּמוֹת בָּעַל וַיַּרְא מִשָּׁם קְצֵה הָעָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And it came to pass in the morning, and Balak took Balaam, and brought him up into the high places of Baal, that he might see from thence the utmost part of the people.

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר בִּלְעָם אֶל־בָּלָק בְּנֵה־לִי בָזֶה שִׁבְעָה מִזְבְּחֹת וְהָכֵן לִי בָּזֶה שִׁבְעָה פָרִים וְשִׁבְעָה אֵילִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Balaam said to Balak, 'Build me here seven altars, and prepare for me here seven bulls and seven rams.'

raw: וַיַּעַשׂ בָּלָק כַּאֲשֶׁר דִּבֶּר בִּלְעָם וַיַּעַל בָּלָק וּבִלְעָם פָּר וָאַיִל בַּמִּזְבֵּחַ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Balak did as Balaam had spoken, and Balak and Balaam offered a bull and a ram on the altar.

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר בִּלְעָם לְבָלָק הִתְיַצֵּב עַל־עֹלָתֶךָ וְאֵלְכָה אוּלַי יִקָּרֵה יְהוָה לִקְרָאתִי וּדְבַר מַה־יַּרְאֵנִי וְהִגַּדְתִּי לָךְ וַיֵּלֶךְ שֶׁפִי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Balaam said to Balak, "Station yourself by your burnt offering, and I will go; perhaps the LORD will encounter me, and whatever He shows me I will tell you." Then he went to a bare height.

raw: וַיִּקָּר אֱלֹהִים אֶל־בִּלְעָם וַיֹּאמֶר אֵלָיו אֶת־שִׁבְעַת הַמִּזְבְּחֹת עָרַכְתִּי וָאַעַל פָּר וָאַיִל בַּמִּזְבֵּחַ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And God appeared to Balaam, and said to him, "I have prepared the seven altars, and I have offered a bull and a ram on the altar."
hebrew_roots: עלה (ALH) - to ascend, to offer up

raw: וַיָּשֶׂם יְהוָה דָּבָר בְּפִי בִלְעָם וַיֹּאמֶר שׁוּב אֶל־בָּלָק וְכֹה תְדַבֵּר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the Lord put a word in Balaam's mouth and said, "Return to Balak, and thus you shall speak."

raw: וַיָּשָׁב אֵלָיו וְהִנֵּה נִצָּב עַל־עֹלָתוֹ הוּא וְכָל־שָׂרֵי מוֹאָב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he returned to him, and behold, he was standing by his burnt offering, he and all the princes of Moab.

raw: וַיִּשָּׂא מְשָׁלוֹ וַיֹּאמַר מִן־אֲרָם יַנְחֵנִי בָלָק מֶלֶךְ־מוֹאָב מֵהַרְרֵי־קֶדֶם לְכָה אָרָה־לִּי יַעֲקֹב וּלְכָה זֹעֲמָה יִשְׂרָאֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he took up his discourse and said, “From Aram Balak the king of Moab has brought me, from the mountains of the East: ‘Come, curse Jacob for me, and come, denounce Israel!’

raw: מָה אֶקֹּב לֹא קַבֹּה אֵל וּמָה אֶזְעֹם לֹא זָעַם יְהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: How can I curse whom God has not cursed? How can I denounce whom the Lord has not denounced?

raw: כִּי־מֵרֹאשׁ צֻרִים אֶרְאֶנּוּ וּמִגְּבָעוֹת אֲשׁוּרֶנּוּ הֶן־עָם לְבָדָד יִשְׁכֹּן וּבַגּוֹיִם לֹא יִתְחַשָּׁב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: For from the top of the rocks I see him, and from the hills I behold him; behold, the people shall dwell alone, and shall not be reckoned among the nations.

raw: מִי מָנָה עֲפַר יַעֲקֹב וּמִסְפָּר אֶת־רֹבַע יִשְׂרָאֵל תָּמֹת נַפְשִׁי מוֹת יְשָׁרִים וּתְהִי אַחֲרִיתִי כָּמֹהוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Who has counted the dust of Jacob, or numbered the fourth part of Israel? Let me die the death of the righteous, and let my end be like his!

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר בָּלָק אֶל־בִּלְעָם מֶה עָשִׂיתָ לִי לָקֹב אֹיְבַי לְקַחְתִּיךָ וְהִנֵּה בֵּרַכְתָּ בָרֵךְ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Balak said to Balaam, "What have you done to me? I took you to curse my enemies, and behold, you have blessed them!"

raw: וַיַּעַן וַיֹּאמַר הֲלֹא אֵת אֲשֶׁר יָשִׂים יְהוָה בְּפִי אֹתוֹ אֶשְׁמֹר לְדַבֵּר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he answered and said, “Did not the Lord put [words] in my mouth? That is what I must be careful to speak.”

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר אֵלָיו בָּלָק לך־[לְכָה־] נָּא אִתִּי אֶל־מָקוֹם אַחֵר אֲשֶׁר תִּרְאֶנּוּ מִשָּׁם אֶפֶס קָצֵהוּ תִרְאֶה וְכֻלּוֹ לֹא תִרְאֶה וְקָבְנוֹ־לִי מִשָּׁם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Balak said to him, "Please go with me to another place from which you can see them; you will see only the outskirts of their camp but will not see them all. Curse them for me from there."

raw: וַיִּקָּחֵהוּ שְׂדֵה צֹפִים אֶל־רֹאשׁ הַפִּסְגָּה וַיִּבֶן שִׁבְעָה מִזְבְּחֹת וַיַּעַל פָּר וָאַיִל בַּמִּזְבֵּחַ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he took him to the field of Zophim, to the top of Pisgah, and built seven altars, and offered a bull and a ram on each altar.

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר אֶל־בָּלָק הִתְיַצֵּב כֹּה עַל־עֹלָתֶךָ וְאָנֹכִי אִקָּרֶה כֹּה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he said to Balak, 'Stand here by your burnt offering, while I meet [with God] here.'

raw: וַיִּקָּר יְהוָה אֶל־בִּלְעָם וַיָּשֶׂם דָּבָר בְּפִיו וַיֹּאמֶר שׁוּב אֶל־בָּלָק וְכֹה תְדַבֵּר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the Lord appeared to Balaam, and put a word in his mouth, and said, "Return to Balak, and thus you shall speak."

raw: וַיָּבֹא אֵלָיו וְהִנּוֹ נִצָּב עַל־עֹלָתוֹ וְשָׂרֵי מוֹאָב אִתּוֹ וַיֹּאמֶר לוֹ בָּלָק מַה־דִּבֶּר יְהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he came to him, and behold, he was standing by his burnt offering, and the princes of Moab were with him. And Balak said to him, "What has the LORD spoken?"

raw: וַיִּשָּׂא מְשָׁלוֹ וַיֹּאמַר קוּם בָּלָק וּשֲׁמָע הַאֲזִינָה עָדַי בְּנוֹ צִפֹּר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he took up his discourse, and said, Rise up, Balak, and hear; listen to me, thou son of Zippor:

raw: לֹא אִישׁ אֵל וִיכַזֵּב וּבֶן־אָדָם וְיִתְנֶחָם הַהוּא אָמַר וְלֹא יַעֲשֶׂה וְדִבֶּר וְלֹא יְקִימֶנָּה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: God is not a man, that He should lie, Nor a son of man, that He should repent. Has He said, and will He not do it? Or has He spoken, and will He not make it good?

raw: הִנֵּה בָרֵךְ לָקָחְתִּי וּבֵרֵךְ וְלֹא אֲשִׁיבֶנָּה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Behold, I have received [a command] to bless; and He has blessed, and I cannot reverse it.

raw: לֹא־הִבִּיט אָוֶן בְּיַעֲקֹב וְלֹא־רָאָה עָמָל בְּיִשְׂרָאֵל יְהוָה אֱלֹהָיו עִמּוֹ וּתְרוּעַת מֶלֶךְ בּוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: He has not beheld misfortune in Jacob, nor has he seen trouble in Israel. The Lord his God is with him, and the shout of a king is among them.

raw: אֵל מוֹצִיאָם מִמִּצְרָיִם כְּתוֹעֲפֹת רְאֵם לוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: God brought them out of Egypt; He has the strength of a wild ox.

raw: כִּי לֹא־נַחַשׁ בְּיַעֲקֹב וְלֹא־קֶסֶם בְּיִשְׂרָאֵל כָּעֵת יֵאָמֵר לְיַעֲקֹב וּלְיִשְׂרָאֵל מַה־פָּעַל אֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: For there is no enchantment against Jacob, neither is there any divination against Israel: according to this time it shall be said of Jacob and of Israel, What hath God wrought!

raw: הֶן־עָם כְּלָבִיא יָקוּם וְכַאֲרִי יִתְנַשָּׂא לֹא יִשְׁכַּב עַד־יֹאכַל טֶרֶף וְדַם־חֲלָלִים יִשְׁתֶּה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Behold, the people rises like a lioness, and as a lion it lifts itself; it does not lie down until it devours prey and drinks the blood of the slain.

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר בָּלָק אֶל־בִּלְעָם גַּם־קֹב לֹא תִקֳּבֶנּוּ גַּם־בָּרֵךְ לֹא תְבָרֲכֶנּוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Balak said to Balaam, "Neither curse him at all, nor bless him at all!"

raw: וַיַּעַן בִּלְעָם וַיֹּאמֶר אֶל־בָּלָק הֲלֹא דִּבַּרְתִּי אֵלֶיךָ לֵאמֹר כֹּל אֲשֶׁר־יְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֹתוֹ אֶעֱשֶׂה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Balaam answered and said to Balak, “Did I not speak to you, saying, ‘All that the Lord speaks, that I must do’?”

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר בָּלָק אֶל־בִּלְעָם לְכָה־נָּא אֶקָּחֲךָ אֶל־מָקוֹם אַחֵר אוּלַי יִישַׁר בְּעֵינֵי הָאֱלֹהִים וְקַבֹּתוֹ לִי מִשָּׁם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Balak said to Balaam, "Come now, I will take you to another place; perhaps it will be pleasing in the sight of God that you curse them for me from there."

raw: וַיִּקַּח בָּלָק אֶת־בִּלְעָם רֹאשׁ הַפְּעוֹר הַנִּשְׁקָף עַל־פְּנֵי הַיְשִׁימֹן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Balaq took Balaam to the summit of Peor, which overlooks the wasteland.

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר בִּלְעָם אֶל־בָּלָק בְּנֵה־לִי בָזֶה שִׁבְעָה מִזְבְּחֹת וְהָכֵן לִי בָּזֶה שִׁבְעָה פָרִים וְשִׁבְעָה אֵילִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Balaam said to Balak, 'Build me here seven altars, and prepare me here seven bulls and seven rams.'

raw: וַיַּעַשׂ בָּלָק כַּאֲשֶׁר אָמַר בִּלְעָם וַיַּעַל פָּר וָאַיִל בַּמִּזְבֵּחַ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Balak did as Balaam had said, and offered a bull and a ram on the altar.

raw: וַיַּרְא בִּלְעָם כִּי טוֹב בְּעֵינֵי יְהוָה לְבָרֵךְ אֶת־יִשְׂרָאֵל וְלֹא־הָלַךְ כְּפַעַם־בְּפַעַם לִקְרַאת נְחָשִׁים וַיָּשֶׁת אֶל־הַמִּדְבָּר פָּנָיו׃
