raw: וַיִּשָּׂא בִלְעָם אֶת־עֵינָיו וַיַּרְא אֶת־יִשְׂרָאֵל שֹׁכֵן לִשְׁבָטָיו וַתְּהִי עָלָיו רוּחַ אֱלֹהִים׃

raw: וַיִּשָּׂא מְשָׁלוֹ וַיֹּאמַר נְאֻם בִּלְעָם בְּנוֹ בְעֹר וּנְאֻם הַגֶּבֶר שְׁתֻם הָעָיִן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he took up his discourse, and said, the utterance of Balaam the son of Beor, and the utterance of the man whose eye is closed.
ai_data.tone: Formal and poetic, typical of prophetic pronouncements.

raw: נְאֻם שֹׁמֵעַ אִמְרֵי־אֵל אֲשֶׁר מַחֲזֵה שַׁדַּי יֶחֱזֶה נֹפֵל וּגְלוּי עֵינָיִם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: The utterance of the one who hears the words of God, who sees the vision of the Almighty, falling down with eyes uncovered.

raw: וְאִם־הָפֵר יָפֵר אֹתָם אַחֲרֵי שָׁמְעוֹ וְנָשָׂא אֶת־עֲוֺנָהּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: But if he utterly annuls them after he has heard them, then he shall bear her iniquity.

raw: אֵלֶּה הַחֻקִּים אֲשֶׁר צִוָּה יְהוָה אֶת־מֹשֶׁה בֵּין אִישׁ לְאִשְׁתּוֹ בֵּין־אָב לְבִתּוֹ בִּנְעֻרֶיהָ בֵּית אָבִיהָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: These are the statutes that the Lord commanded Moses between a man and his wife, and between a father and his daughter, while she is young, in her father's house.

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה לֵּאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying:

raw: נְקֹם נִקְמַת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל מֵאֵת הַמִּדְיָנִים אַחַר תֵּאָסֵף אֶל־עַמֶּיךָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Avenge the vengeance of the children of Israel on the Midianites; afterward you shall be gathered to your people.

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר מֹשֶׁה אֶל־הָעָם לֵאמֹר הֵחָלְצוּ מֵאִתְּכֶם אֲנָשִׁים לַצָּבָא וְיִהְיוּ עַל־מִדְיָן לָתֵת נִקְמַת־יְהוָה בְּמִדְיָן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses spoke to the people, saying, "Arm yourselves from among you men for war, that they may go against Midian to execute the Lord's vengeance on Midian."

raw: אֶלֶף לַמַּטֶּה אֶלֶף לַמַּטֶּה לְכֹל מַטּוֹת יִשְׂרָאֵל תִּשְׁלְחוּ לַצָּבָא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: A thousand from each tribe, a thousand from each tribe; from all the tribes of Israel you shall send to the army.

raw: וַיִּמָּסְרוּ מֵאַלְפֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל אֶלֶף לַמַּטֶּה שְׁנֵים־עָשָׂר אֶלֶף חֲלוּצֵי צָבָא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And there were delivered out of the thousands of Israel, a thousand of each tribe, twelve thousand armed for war.

raw: וַיִּשְׁלַח אֹתָם מֹשֶׁה אֶלֶף לַמַּטֶּה לַצָּבָא אֹתָם וְאֶת־פִּינְחָס בֶּן־אֶלְעָזָר הַכֹּהֵן לַצָּבָא וּכְלֵי הַקֹּדֶשׁ וַחֲצֹצְרוֹת הַתְּרוּעָה בְּיָדוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses sent them, a thousand from each tribe, to the army, them and Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest, to the army, with the vessels of the sanctuary and the trumpets for the alarm in his hand.

raw: וַיִּצְבְּאוּ עַל־מִדְיָן כַּאֲשֶׁר צִוָּה יְהוָה אֶת־מֹשֶׁה וַיַּהַרְגוּ כָּל־זָכָר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they warred against Midian, as the LORD commanded Moses, and they killed every male.

hebrew_roots.meaning: to wage war, to serve, to assemble
a particle indicating the direct object

raw: וְאֶת־מַלְכֵי מִדְיָן הָרְגוּ עַל־חַלְלֵיהֶם אֶת־אֱוִי וְאֶת־רֶקֶם וְאֶת־צוּר וְאֶת־חוּר וְאֶת־רֶבַע חֲמֵשֶׁת מַלְכֵי מִדְיָן וְאֵת בִּלְעָם בֶּן־בְּעוֹר הָרְגוּ בֶּחָרֶב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the kings of Midian they killed along with their slain: Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur, and Reba, the five kings of Midian; and Balaam son of Beor they killed with the sword.

raw: וַיִּשְׁבּוּ בְנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל אֶת־נְשֵׁי מִדְיָן וְאֶת־טַפָּם וְאֵת כָּל־בְּהֶמְתָּם וְאֶת־כָּל־מִקְנֵהֶם וְאֶת־כָּל־חֵילָם בָּזָזוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the children of Israel took captive the women of Midian, and their little ones, and took as spoil all their cattle, and all their flocks, and all their goods.

raw: וְאֵת כָּל־עָרֵיהֶם בְּמוֹשְׁבֹתָם וְאֵת כָּל־טִירֹתָם שָׂרְפוּ בָּאֵשׁ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And all their cities in their settlements, and all their fortresses, they burned with fire.

raw: וַיִּקְחוּ אֶת־כָּל־הַשָּׁלָל וְאֵת כָּל־הַמַּלְקוֹחַ בָּאָדָם וּבַבְּהֵמָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they took all the spoil and all the booty, both of man and beast.

raw: וַיָּבִאוּ אֶל־מֹשֶׁה וְאֶל־אֶלְעָזָר הַכֹּהֵן וְאֶל־עֲדַת בְּנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל אֶת־הַשְּׁבִי וְאֶת־הַמַּלְקוֹחַ וְאֶת־הַשָּׁלָל אֶל־הַמַּחֲנֶה אֶל־עַרְבֹת מוֹאָב אֲשֶׁר עַל־יַרְדֵּן יְרֵחוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they brought to Moses and to Eleazar the priest and to the congregation of the children of Israel the captives and the spoil and the plunder to the camp, to the plains of Moab, which are by the Jordan at Jericho.

raw: וַיֵּצְאוּ מֹשֶׁה וְאֶלְעָזָר הַכֹּהֵן וְכָל־נְשִׂיאֵי הָעֵדָה לִקְרָאתָם אֶל־מִחוּץ לַמַּחֲנֶה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses and Eleazar the priest and all the leaders of the community went out to meet them outside the camp.

raw: וַיִּקְצֹף מֹשֶׁה עַל פְּקוּדֵי הֶחָיִל שָׂרֵי הָאֲלָפִים וְשָׂרֵי הַמֵּאוֹת הַבָּאִים מִצְּבָא הַמִּלְחָמָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses was wroth with the officers of the host, the captains of thousands, and captains of hundreds, who came from the service of war.

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר אֲלֵיהֶם מֹשֶׁה הַחִיִּיתֶם כָּל־נְקֵבָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses said to them, 'Have you kept all the women alive?'

raw: הֵן הֵנָּה הָיוּ לִבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל בִּדְבַר בִּלְעָם לִמְסָר־מַעַל בַּיהוָה עַל־דְּבַר־פְּעוֹר וַתְּהִי הַמַּגֵּפָה בַּעֲדַת יְהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Behold, these caused the children of Israel, through the counsel of Balaam, to commit trespass against the LORD in the matter of Peor, and so there was a plague among the congregation of the LORD.

raw: וְעַתָּה הִרְגוּ כָל־זָכָר בַּטָּף וְכָל־אִשָּׁה יֹדַעַת אִישׁ לְמִשְׁכַּב זָכָר הֲרֹגוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Now therefore kill every male among the little ones, and kill every woman that hath known man by lying with him.

raw: וְכֹל הַטַּף בַּנָּשִׁים אֲשֶׁר לֹא־יָדְעוּ מִשְׁכַּב זָכָר הַחֲיוּ לָכֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: and all the young girls among the women who have not known a man intimately, keep alive for yourselves.

raw: וְאַתֶּם חֲנוּ מִחוּץ לַמַּחֲנֶה שִׁבְעַת יָמִים כֹּל הֹרֵג נֶפֶשׁ וְכֹל נֹגֵעַ בֶּחָלָל תִּתְחַטְּאוּ בַּיּוֹם הַשְּׁלִישִׁי וּבַיּוֹם הַשְּׁבִיעִי אַתֶּם וּשְׁבִיכֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall encamp outside the camp seven days. Whoever has killed a person and whoever has touched a corpse, purify yourselves on the third day and on the seventh day, you and your captives.

raw: וְכָל־בֶּגֶד וְכָל־כְּלִי־עוֹר וְכָל־מַעֲשֵׂה עִזִּים וְכָל־כְּלִי־עֵץ תִּתְחַטָּאוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And every garment, and every article of skin, and everything made of goats’ hair, and every article of wood, you shall purify.

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר אֶלְעָזָר הַכֹּהֵן אֶל־אַנְשֵׁי הַצָּבָא הַבָּאִים לַמִּלְחָמָה זֹאת חֻקַּת הַתּוֹרָה אֲשֶׁר־צִוָּה יְהוָה אֶת־מֹשֶׁה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Eleazar the priest said to the men of the army who had gone to battle, "This is the statute of the law that the Lord commanded Moses."

raw: אַךְ אֶת־הַזָּהָב וְאֶת־הַכָּסֶף אֶת־הַנְּחֹשֶׁת אֶת־הַבַּרְזֶל אֶת־הַבְּדִיל וְאֶת־הָעֹפָרֶת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: But all the gold, and the silver, the bronze, the iron, the tin, and the lead,

raw: כָּל־דָּבָר אֲשֶׁר־יָבֹא בָאֵשׁ תַּעֲבִירוּ בָאֵשׁ וְטָהֵר אַךְ בְּמֵי נִדָּה יִתְחַטָּא וְכֹל אֲשֶׁר לֹא־יָבֹא בָּאֵשׁ תַּעֲבִירוּ בַמָּיִם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Every thing that can withstand fire, you shall pass through the fire, and it shall be purified. However, it must be purified with water of purification. And everything that cannot withstand fire, you shall pass through the water.

raw: וְכִבַּסְתֶּם בִּגְדֵיכֶם בַּיּוֹם הַשְּׁבִיעִי וּטְהַרְתֶּם וְאַחַר תָּבֹאוּ אֶל־הַמַּחֲנֶה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall wash your clothes on the seventh day and be clean; and afterward you shall come into the camp.

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה לֵּאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Yahweh said to Moses, saying:

raw: שָׂא אֵת רֹאשׁ מַלְקוֹחַ הַשְּׁבִי בָּאָדָם וּבַבְּהֵמָה אַתָּה וְאֶלְעָזָר הַכֹּהֵן וְרָאשֵׁי אֲבוֹת הָעֵדָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Take the sum of the plunder that was taken, both of man and of beast, you and Eleazar the priest and the chiefs of the fathers' houses of the congregation.

raw: וְחָצִיתָ אֶת־הַמַּלְקוֹחַ בֵּין תֹּפְשֵׂי הַמִּלְחָמָה הַיֹּצְאִים לַצָּבָא וּבֵין כָּל־הָעֵדָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall divide the spoil between those who took hold of the war and went out to the army, and between all the congregation.

raw: וַהֲרֵמֹתָ מֶכֶס לַיהוָה מֵאֵת אַנְשֵׁי הַמִּלְחָמָה הַיֹּצְאִים לַצָּבָא אֶחָד נֶפֶשׁ מֵחֲמֵשׁ הַמֵּאוֹת מִן־הָאָדָם וּמִן־הַבָּקָר וּמִן־הַחֲמֹרִים וּמִן־הַצֹּאן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall levy a tribute for the Lord from the men of war who go out to battle, one soul out of five hundred, from the people and from the cattle and from the donkeys and from the sheep.

raw: מִמַּחֲצִיתָם תִּקָּחוּ וְנָתַתָּה לְאֶלְעָזָר הַכֹּהֵן תְּרוּמַת יְהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: From their half you shall take and give to Eleazar the priest, the Lord's offering.

raw: וּמִמַּחֲצִת בְּנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל תִּקַּח אֶחָד אָחֻז מִן־הַחֲמִשִּׁים מִן־הָאָדָם מִן־הַבָּקָר מִן־הַחֲמֹרִים וּמִן־הַצֹּאן מִכָּל־הַבְּהֵמָה וְנָתַתָּה אֹתָם לַלְוִיִּם שֹׁמְרֵי מִשְׁמֶרֶת מִשְׁכַּן יְהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And from half of the Israelites, you shall take one taken from fifty, from the people, from the cattle, from the donkeys, and from the sheep, from all the livestock, and give them to the Levites who keep watch over the service of the tabernacle of the Lord.

raw: וַיַּעַשׂ מֹשֶׁה וְאֶלְעָזָר הַכֹּהֵן כַּאֲשֶׁר צִוָּה יְהוָה אֶת־מֹשֶׁה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses and Eleazar the priest did as the Lord commanded Moses.

raw: וַיְהִי הַמַּלְקוֹחַ יֶתֶר הַבָּז אֲשֶׁר בָּזְזוּ עַם הַצָּבָא צֹאן שֵׁשׁ־מֵאוֹת אֶלֶף וְשִׁבְעִים אֶלֶף וַחֲמֵשֶׁת־אֲלָפִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the spoil, being the rest of the plunder which the people of the army had plundered, was six hundred and seventy-five thousand sheep.

raw: וּבָקָר שְׁנַיִם וְשִׁבְעִים אָלֶף׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And cattle, seventy-two thousand.

raw: וַחֲמֹרִים אֶחָד וְשִׁשִּׁים אָלֶף׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And donkeys, sixty-one thousand.

raw: וְנֶפֶשׁ אָדָם מִן־הַנָּשִׁים אֲשֶׁר לֹא־יָדְעוּ מִשְׁכַּב זָכָר כָּל־נֶפֶשׁ שְׁנַיִם וּשְׁלֹשִׁים אָלֶף׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the persons, the women who had not known carnal knowledge with a male, all the persons were thirty-two thousand.

raw: וַתְּהִי הַמֶּחֱצָה חֵלֶק הַיֹּצְאִים בַּצָּבָא מִסְפַּר הַצֹּאן שְׁלֹשׁ־מֵאוֹת אֶלֶף וּשְׁלֹשִׁים אֶלֶף וְשִׁבְעַת אֲלָפִים וַחֲמֵשׁ מֵאוֹת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the half was the portion of those who went out to war: the number of sheep was three hundred thousand and thirty thousand and seven thousand and five hundred.

raw: וַיְהִי הַמֶּכֶס לַיהוָה מִן־הַצֹּאן שֵׁשׁ מֵאוֹת חָמֵשׁ וְשִׁבְעִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the tax for the Lord from the flock was six hundred and seventy-five.
ai_data.tone: Narrative, legalistic (referring to taxation and obligation to God)

raw: וְהַבָּקָר שִׁשָּׁה וּשְׁלֹשִׁים אָלֶף וּמִכְסָם לַיהוָה שְׁנַיִם וְשִׁבְעִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the cattle were thirty-six thousand, and their tribute to the LORD was seventy-two.

raw: וַחֲמֹרִים שְׁלֹשִׁים אֶלֶף וַחֲמֵשׁ מֵאוֹת וּמִכְסָם לַיהוָה אֶחָד וְשִׁשִּׁים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: and thirty thousand five hundred donkeys, and their tribute to the Lord was sixty-one.

raw: וְנֶפֶשׁ אָדָם שִׁשָּׁה עָשָׂר אָלֶף וּמִכְסָם לַיהוָה שְׁנַיִם וּשְׁלֹשִׁים נָפֶשׁ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the life of a person, sixteen thousand, and their tribute to the Lord, thirty-two souls.

raw: וַיִּתֵּן מֹשֶׁה אֶת־מֶכֶס תְּרוּמַת יְהוָה לְאֶלְעָזָר הַכֹּהֵן כַּאֲשֶׁר צִוָּה יְהוָה אֶת־מֹשֶׁה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses gave the tax, the offering for the LORD, to Eleazar the priest, as the LORD commanded Moses.

raw: וּמִמַּחֲצִית בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל אֲשֶׁר חָצָה מֹשֶׁה מִן־הָאֲנָשִׁים הַצֹּבְאִים׃

hebrew_roots.definition: Ahihud (name, meaning 'my brother is union' or 'brother of union')

raw: וּלְמַטֵּה בְנֵי־נַפְתָּלִי נָשִׂיא פְּדַהְאֵל בֶּן־עַמִּיהוּד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And for the tribe of the children of Naphtali, the leader was Pedahel, son of Ammihud.

raw: אֵלֶּה אֲשֶׁר צִוָּה יְהוָה לְנַחֵל אֶת־בְּנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל בְּאֶרֶץ כְּנָעַן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: These are the things that the LORD commanded to allot to the children of Israel in the land of Canaan.

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה בְּעַרְבֹת מוֹאָב עַל־יַרְדֵּן יְרֵחוֹ לֵאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD spoke to Moses in the plains of Moab by the Jordan, near Jericho, saying:

raw: צַו אֶת־בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְנָתְנוּ לַלְוִיִּם מִנַּחֲלַת אֲחֻזָּתָם עָרִים לָשָׁבֶת וּמִגְרָשׁ לֶעָרִים סְבִיבֹתֵיהֶם תִּתְּנוּ לַלְוִיִּם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Command the children of Israel, that they give unto the Levites of the inheritance of their possession cities to dwell in; and ye shall give also unto the Levites suburbs for the cities round about them.

raw: וְהָיוּ הֶעָרִים לָהֶם לָשָׁבֶת וּמִגְרְשֵׁיהֶם יִהְיוּ לִבְהֶמְתָּם וְלִרְכֻשָׁם וּלְכֹל חַיָּתָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the cities shall be theirs to dwell in, and their pasture lands shall be for their livestock, for their possessions, and for all their beasts.

raw: וּמִגְרְשֵׁי הֶעָרִים אֲשֶׁר תִּתְּנוּ לַלְוִיִּם מִקִּיר הָעִיר וָחוּצָה אֶלֶף אַמָּה סָבִיב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the open spaces of the cities that you shall give to the Levites shall extend from the wall of the city outward a thousand cubits all around.

raw: וּמַדֹּתֶם מִחוּץ לָעִיר אֶת־פְּאַת־קֵדְמָה אַלְפַּיִם בָּאַמָּה וְאֶת־פְּאַת־נֶגֶב אַלְפַּיִם בָּאַמָּה וְאֶת־פְּאַת־יָם אַלְפַּיִם בָּאַמָּה וְאֵת פְּאַת צָפוֹן אַלְפַּיִם בָּאַמָּה וְהָעִיר בַּתָּוֶךְ זֶה יִהְיֶה לָהֶם מִגְרְשֵׁי הֶעָרִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall measure outside the city the east side two thousand cubits, and the south side two thousand cubits, and the west side two thousand cubits, and the north side two thousand cubits, with the city in the center. This shall be their open space for the cities.

raw: וְאֵת הֶעָרִים אֲשֶׁר תִּתְּנוּ לַלְוִיִּם אֵת שֵׁשׁ־עָרֵי הַמִּקְלָט אֲשֶׁר תִּתְּנוּ לָנֻס שָׁמָּה הָרֹצֵחַ וַעֲלֵיהֶם תִּתְּנוּ אַרְבָּעִים וּשְׁתַּיִם עִיר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the cities which you shall give to the Levites, [shall be] the six cities of refuge, which you shall give for the manslayer to flee there; and in addition to them you shall give forty and two cities.

raw: כָּל־הֶעָרִים אֲשֶׁר תִּתְּנוּ לַלְוִיִּם אַרְבָּעִים וּשְׁמֹנֶה עִיר אֶתְהֶן וְאֶת־מִגְרְשֵׁיהֶן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: All the cities which you shall give to the Levites shall be forty-eight cities with their pasture lands.

raw: וְהֶעָרִים אֲשֶׁר תִּתְּנוּ מֵאֲחֻזַּת בְּנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל מֵאֵת הָרַב תַּרְבּוּ וּמֵאֵת הַמְעַט תַּמְעִיטוּ אִישׁ כְּפִי נַחֲלָתוֹ אֲשֶׁר יִנְחָלוּ יִתֵּן מֵעָרָיו לַלְוִיִּם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the cities which you shall give from the possession of the children of Israel, from the larger [tribe] you shall increase, and from the smaller you shall diminish; each shall give from his cities to the Levites according to his inheritance which he inherits.

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה לֵּאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the Lord spoke to Moses, saying:

raw: דַּבֵּר אֶל־בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְאָמַרְתָּ אֲלֵהֶם כִּי אַתֶּם עֹבְרִים אֶת־הַיַּרְדֵּן אַרְצָה כְּנָעַן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Speak to the children of Israel, and say to them: When you cross the Jordan into the land of Canaan...

raw: וְהִקְרִיתֶם לָכֶם עָרִים עָרֵי מִקְלָט תִּהְיֶינָה לָכֶם וְנָס שָׁמָּה רֹצֵחַ מַכֵּה־נֶפֶשׁ בִּשְׁגָגָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall designate for yourselves cities; they shall be cities of refuge for you, so that the manslayer who strikes a person unintentionally may flee there.

raw: וְהָיוּ לָכֶם הֶעָרִים לְמִקְלָט מִגֹּאֵל וְלֹא יָמוּת הָרֹצֵחַ עַד־עָמְדוֹ לִפְנֵי הָעֵדָה לַמִּשְׁפָּט׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the cities shall be for you a refuge from the avenger, and the manslayer shall not die until he stands before the congregation for judgment.

raw: וְהֶעָרִים אֲשֶׁר תִּתֵּנוּ שֵׁשׁ־עָרֵי מִקְלָט תִּהְיֶינָה לָכֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the cities which you give shall be six cities of refuge shall they be for you.

raw: אֵת שְׁלֹשׁ הֶעָרִים תִּתְּנוּ מֵעֵבֶר לַיַּרְדֵּן וְאֵת שְׁלֹשׁ הֶעָרִים תִּתְּנוּ בְּאֶרֶץ כְּנָעַן עָרֵי מִקְלָט תִּהְיֶינָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: You shall give three cities across the Jordan, and you shall give three cities in the land of Canaan; they shall be cities of refuge.

raw: לִבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְלַגֵּר וְלַתּוֹשָׁב בְּתוֹכָם תִּהְיֶינָה שֵׁשׁ־הֶעָרִים הָאֵלֶּה לְמִקְלָט לָנוּס שָׁמָּה כָּל־מַכֵּה־נֶפֶשׁ בִּשְׁגָגָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: For the children of Israel, and for the stranger, and for the resident alien among them, these six cities shall be for refuge, that anyone who kills a person unintentionally may flee there.
hebrew_roots: גור (G-W-R) - to sojourn, dwell as a stranger

raw: וְאִם־בִּכְלִי בַרְזֶל הִכָּהוּ וַיָּמֹת רֹצֵחַ הוּא מוֹת יוּמַת הָרֹצֵחַ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if with an instrument of iron he struck him, so that he died, he is a murderer; the murderer shall surely be put to death.

raw: וְאִם בְּאֶבֶן יָד אֲשֶׁר־יָמוּת בָּהּ הִכָּהוּ וַיָּמֹת רֹצֵחַ הוּא מוֹת יוּמַת הָרֹצֵחַ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if with a stone of the hand with which he may die, he struck him and he died, he is a murderer; the murderer shall surely be put to death.

raw: אוֹ בִּכְלִי עֵץ־יָד אֲשֶׁר־יָמוּת בּוֹ הִכָּהוּ וַיָּמֹת רֹצֵחַ הוּא מוֹת יוּמַת הָרֹצֵחַ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Or if with a wooden object in the hand, wherewith he may die, he struck him, and he died; he is a murderer: the murderer shall surely be put to death.

raw: גֹּאֵל הַדָּם הוּא יָמִית אֶת־הָרֹצֵחַ בְּפִגְעוֹ־בוֹ הוּא יְמִיתֶנּוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: The avenger of blood shall himself put the murderer to death; when he meets him, he shall put him to death.

raw: וְאִם־בְּשִׂנְאָה יֶהְדָּפֶנּוּ אוֹ־הִשְׁלִיךְ עָלָיו בִּצְדִיָּה וַיָּמֹת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if in hatred he pushed him, or hurled at him with intent, and he died:

hebrew_roots.meaning: intent, ambush (related to 'emptying' - perhaps emptying of all restraint)

raw: אוֹ בְאֵיבָה הִכָּהוּ בְיָדוֹ וַיָּמֹת מוֹת־יוּמַת הַמַּכֶּה רֹצֵחַ הוּא גֹּאֵל הַדָּם יָמִית אֶת־הָרֹצֵחַ בְּפִגְעוֹ־בוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Or if he struck him in enmity with his hand, and he died, the one who struck him shall surely be put to death; he is a murderer. The avenger of blood shall put the murderer to death when he meets him.

raw: וְאִם־בְּפֶתַע בְּלֹא־אֵיבָה הֲדָפוֹ אוֹ־הִשְׁלִיךְ עָלָיו כָּל־כְּלִי בְּלֹא צְדִיָּה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if suddenly, without animosity, he pushed him, or threw any object on him without premeditation...

raw: אוֹ בְכָל־אֶבֶן אֲשֶׁר־יָמוּת בָּהּ בְּלֹא רְאוֹת וַיַּפֵּל עָלָיו וַיָּמֹת וְהוּא לֹא־אוֹיֵב לוֹ וְלֹא מְבַקֵּשׁ רָעָתוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Or if with any stone with which he might die, though without seeing, and casts [it] upon him, and he dies, and he [is] not an enemy to him, nor seeking his harm.

raw: וְשָׁפְטוּ הָעֵדָה בֵּין הַמַּכֶּה וּבֵין גֹּאֵל הַדָּם עַל הַמִּשְׁפָּטִים הָאֵלֶּה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the congregation shall judge between the assailant and the avenger of blood, according to these ordinances.

raw: וְהִצִּילוּ הָעֵדָה אֶת־הָרֹצֵחַ מִיַּד גֹּאֵל הַדָּם וְהֵשִׁיבוּ אֹתוֹ הָעֵדָה אֶל־עִיר מִקְלָטוֹ אֲשֶׁר־נָס שָׁמָּה וְיָשַׁב בָּהּ עַד־מוֹת הַכֹּהֵן הַגָּדֹל אֲשֶׁר־מָשַׁח אֹתוֹ בְּשֶׁמֶן הַקֹּדֶשׁ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the congregation shall rescue the slayer from the hand of the avenger of blood, and the congregation shall return him to his city of refuge to which he fled, and he shall dwell in it until the death of the high priest who was anointed with the holy oil.

raw: וְאִם־יָצֹא יֵצֵא הָרֹצֵחַ אֶת־גְּבוּל עִיר מִקְלָטוֹ אֲשֶׁר יָנוּס שָׁמָּה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if the murderer ever leaves the border of his city of refuge to which he has fled...

raw: וּמָצָא אֹתוֹ גֹּאֵל הַדָּם מִחוּץ לִגְבוּל עִיר מִקְלָטוֹ וְרָצַח גֹּאֵל הַדָּם אֶת־הָרֹצֵחַ אֵין לוֹ דָּם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the avenger of blood finds him outside the boundary of his city of refuge, and the avenger of blood murders the manslayer, he has no bloodguilt.

raw: כִּי בְעִיר מִקְלָטוֹ יֵשֵׁב עַד־מוֹת הַכֹּהֵן הַגָּדֹל וְאַחֲרֵי מוֹת הַכֹּהֵן הַגָּדֹל יָשׁוּב הָרֹצֵחַ אֶל־אֶרֶץ אֲחֻזָּתוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: For he shall remain in his city of refuge until the death of the high priest; but after the death of the high priest, the manslayer may return to his land holding.

raw: וְהָיוּ אֵלֶּה לָכֶם לְחֻקַּת מִשְׁפָּט לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶם בְּכֹל מוֹשְׁבֹתֵיכֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And these shall be for you a statute of judgment throughout your generations in all your dwelling places.

raw: כָּל־מַכֵּה־נֶפֶשׁ לְפִי עֵדִים יִרְצַח אֶת־הָרֹצֵחַ וְעֵד אֶחָד לֹא־יַעֲנֶה בְנֶפֶשׁ לָמוּת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Whoever strikes a person, according to witnesses, the murderer shall be put to death; but one witness shall not testify against a person to put him to death.

raw: וְלֹא־תִקְחוּ כֹפֶר לְנֶפֶשׁ רֹצֵחַ אֲשֶׁר־הוּא רָשָׁע לָמוּת כִּי־מוֹת יוּמָת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall not take ransom for the life of a murderer, who is guilty of death; but he shall surely be put to death.

raw: וְלֹא־תִקְחוּ כֹפֶר לָנוּס אֶל־עִיר מִקְלָטוֹ לָשׁוּב לָשֶׁבֶת בָּאָרֶץ עַד־מוֹת הַכֹּהֵן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall not take ransom for him who has fled to his city of refuge, to return to dwell in the land until the death of the priest.

raw: וְלֹא־תַחֲנִיפוּ אֶת־הָאָרֶץ אֲשֶׁר אַתֶּם בָּהּ כִּי הַדָּם הוּא יַחֲנִיף אֶת־הָאָרֶץ וְלָאָרֶץ לֹא־יְכֻפַּר לַדָּם אֲשֶׁר שֻׁפַּךְ־בָּהּ כִּי־אִם בְּדַם שֹׁפְכוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall not pollute the land in which you live, for blood pollutes the land, and the land cannot be atoned for the blood that is shed on it, except by the blood of the one who shed it.

raw: וְלֹא תְטַמֵּא אֶת־הָאָרֶץ אֲשֶׁר אַתֶּם יֹשְׁבִים בָּהּ אֲשֶׁר אֲנִי שֹׁכֵן בְּתוֹכָהּ כִּי אֲנִי יְהוָה שֹׁכֵן בְּתוֹךְ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall not defile the land in which you live, in which I dwell, for I am the Lord who dwells among the children of Israel.

raw: וַיִּקְרְבוּ רָאשֵׁי הָאָבוֹת לְמִשְׁפַּחַת בְּנֵי־גִלְעָד בֶּן־מָכִיר בֶּן־מְנַשֶּׁה מִמִּשְׁפְּחֹת בְּנֵי יוֹסֵף וַיְדַבְּרוּ לִפְנֵי מֹשֶׁה וְלִפְנֵי הַנְּשִׂאִים רָאשֵׁי אָבוֹת לִבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the heads of the fathers' houses of the family of the sons of Gilead, son of Machir, son of Manasseh, of the families of the sons of Joseph, approached and spoke before Moses and before the leaders, the heads of the fathers' houses of the children of Israel.

raw: וַיֹּאמְרוּ אֶת־אֲדֹנִי צִוָּה יְהוָה לָתֵת אֶת־הָאָרֶץ בְּנַחֲלָה בְּגוֹרָל לִבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וַאדֹנִי צֻוָּה בַיהוָה לָתֵת אֶת־נַחֲלַת צְלָפְחָד אָחִינוּ לִבְנֹתָיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they said, 'My lord commanded Yahweh to give the land as an inheritance by lot to the children of Israel, and my lord was commanded by Yahweh to give the inheritance of Zelophehad our brother to his daughters.'

raw: וְהָיוּ לְאֶחָד מִבְּנֵי שִׁבְטֵי בְנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל לְנָשִׁים וְנִגְרְעָה נַחֲלָתָן מִנַּחֲלַת אֲבֹתֵינוּ וְנוֹסַף עַל נַחֲלַת הַמַּטֶּה אֲשֶׁר תִּהְיֶינָה לָהֶם וּמִגֹּרַל נַחֲלָתֵנוּ יִגָּרֵעַ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they are to one of the sons of the tribes of the children of Israel as wives, and their inheritance is diminished from the inheritance of our fathers, and it is added to the inheritance of the tribe to which they belong, and from the lot of our inheritance it is diminished.

raw: וְאִם־יִהְיֶה הַיֹּבֵל לִבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְנוֹסְפָה נַחֲלָתָן עַל נַחֲלַת הַמַּטֶּה אֲשֶׁר תִּהְיֶינָה לָהֶם וּמִנַּחֲלַת מַטֵּה אֲבֹתֵינוּ יִגָּרַע נַחֲלָתָן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And if the jubilee is for the children of Israel, then their inheritance shall be added to the inheritance of the tribe to which they belong, and from the inheritance of the tribe of our fathers shall their inheritance be diminished.

raw: וַיְצַו מֹשֶׁה אֶת־בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל עַל־פִּי יְהוָה לֵאמֹר כֵּן מַטֵּה בְנֵי־יוֹסֵף דֹּבְרִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses commanded the children of Israel according to the word of the Lord, saying: 'The tribe of the children of Joseph speaks rightly.'

raw: זֶה הַדָּבָר אֲשֶׁר־צִוָּה יְהוָה לִבְנוֹת צְלָפְחָד לֵאמֹר לַטּוֹב בְּעֵינֵיהֶם תִּהְיֶינָה לְנָשִׁים אַךְ לְמִשְׁפַּחַת מַטֵּה אֲבִיהֶם תִּהְיֶינָה לְנָשִׁים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: This is the thing which the Lord commanded concerning the daughters of Zelophehad, saying, 'Let them marry whom they think best, only into the family of the tribe of their father shall they marry.'

raw: וְלֹא־תִסֹּב נַחֲלָה לִבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל מִמַּטֶּה אֶל־מַטֶּה כִּי אִישׁ בְּנַחֲלַת מַטֵּה אֲבֹתָיו יִדְבְּקוּ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: So shall no inheritance of the children of Israel remove from tribe to tribe; for every one of the children of Israel shall keep himself to the inheritance of the tribe of his fathers.

raw: וְכָל־בַּת יֹרֶשֶׁת נַחֲלָה מִמַּטּוֹת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל לְאֶחָד מִמִּשְׁפַּחַת מַטֵּה אָבִיהָ תִּהְיֶה לְאִשָּׁה לְמַעַן יִירְשׁוּ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל אִישׁ נַחֲלַת אֲבֹתָיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And every daughter who inherits an inheritance from the tribes of the children of Israel shall be wife to one from the family of the tribe of her father, so that the children of Israel may possess every man the inheritance of his fathers.

raw: וְלֹא־תִסֹּב נַחֲלָה מִמַּטֶּה לְמַטֶּה אַחֵר כִּי־אִישׁ בְּנַחֲלָתוֹ יִדְבְּקוּ מַטּוֹת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: So shall no inheritance remove from one tribe to another tribe; for every one of the tribes of the children of Israel shall keep himself to his own inheritance.

raw: כַּאֲשֶׁר צִוָּה יְהוָה אֶת־מֹשֶׁה כֵּן עָשׂוּ בְּנוֹת צְלָפְחָד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: As the Lord commanded Moses, so did the daughters of Zelophehad.

raw: וַתִּהְיֶינָה מַחְלָה תִרְצָה וְחָגְלָה וּמִלְכָּה וְנֹעָה בְּנוֹת צְלָפְחָד לִבְנֵי דֹדֵיהֶן לְנָשִׁים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they became wives to their cousins: Mahlah, Tirzah, Hoglah, Milcah, and Noah, the daughters of Zelophehad.

raw: מִמִּשְׁפְּחֹת בְּנֵי־מְנַשֶּׁה בֶן־יוֹסֵף הָיוּ לְנָשִׁים וַתְּהִי נַחֲלָתָן עַל־מַטֵּה מִשְׁפַּחַת אֲבִיהֶן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: From the families of the sons of Manasseh, son of Joseph, they had wives, and their inheritance remained on the tribe of the family of their father.

raw: אֵלֶּה הַמִּצְוֺת וְהַמִּשְׁפָּטִים אֲשֶׁר צִוָּה יְהוָה בְּיַד־מֹשֶׁה אֶל־בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל בְּעַרְבֹת מוֹאָב עַל יַרְדֵּן יְרֵחוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: These are the commandments, the statutes, and the judgments, which the Lord commanded by the hand of Moses to the children of Israel in the plains of Moab by the Jordan near Jericho.
